text: We listen to the immortal music of Mozart's Adagio of the Clarinet Concerto in A.

Space, infinite and empty. But then, slowly all nine planets of our Solar System mov into frame and align. The last of them is the giant, burning sphere of the sun. Just as the sun enters frame, a solar storm of gigantic proportion unfolds. The eruptions shoot thousands of mile into the blackness of space.

Mozart's concerto filters from a jeep's stereo, fighting drumming sounds of the monsoon rain. PROF. FREDERIC WEST, listens to the music. An Indian BOY playing by the roadside steers his wooden t ship across a puddle. The Professor turns to his driver, pointing to the boy.
Watch out!

But it's too late. The jeep drives straight through the puddle at full speed, sinking the boy's toy ship. In the background, the jeep stops in front of a building. driver jumps out, leading the Professor towards its entra The sign at the door reads: `Institute for Astrophysics - University of New Delhi'.
An endless mine shaft. An old elevator cage comes to a grinding halt. When Prof. West steps out we see that he i accompanied now by a nervous DR. SATNAM TSURUTANI, 32.
How deep are we?
8200 feet. Used to be an old copper mine, Professor, sir.
As Prof. West follows Satnam, he takes in the unusual set for this science lab.
Helmsley told me that the neutrino count doubled during the last sun eruptions.
Correct, sir. But that is not what worries me...
They enter a large room with low hanging ceilings. A smal group of WHITE COATS look up from their computers, which show images of the solar storm we witnessed earlier.
There was a new solar storm, so strong that the physical reaction got even more severe.
How can that be?
We don't know, Professor, sir.
Satnam walks over into another room. There he opens a hat on the floor and hot steam rises.
The neutrinos suddenly act like... microwaves.
Prof. West slowly steps closer. When he discovers that th water in the tank below is boiling, his face goes pale.

A major fund raising party is under way. The setting is spectacular. A terrace overlooking the Washington Mall an the Capitol Building. ADRIAN HELMSLEY, 32, stands with a group of young POLITIC AIDES. He is the only African-American among them. One of the aides spots CARL ANHEUSER, 58, White House Chi of Staff, working the crowd.
Look at Anheuser. Anyone would think he was President. Did you hear, he wants us to sign in and out like school boys?
I still can't believe that Wilson chose him of all people to run the White House.
Why not? Anheuser owns the Senate and the Congress.
Shame he's such a pompous ass.
Somebody mention my name?
Adrian turns to see Anheuser smiling.
Yes sir... No, sir.
Which one is it?
We were talking about what a great speech you gave tonight. Well done, sir.
It's Helmsley, right? I'll remember that.
Anheuser walks away with a dangerous smile.
That guy scares the shit out of me.
At that moment Adrian's cell phone rings.
(into the phone) Professor West?
I've been trying to reach you!
Prof. West is on the phone. In the background we make out Satnam's family around the dining room table.
Listen, Adrian. The situation is much worse than we thought...
Satnam quiets his little son. It is the boy we saw earlie with his toy ship.
Adrian follows Anheuser through a hallway of the White Ho papers in hand.
Sir, the President needs to know this.
Helmsley, how long have you been on the job as science advisor?
Four months this week.
I would   say that's enough time to learn that we   have rules here. You'll just have to   wait until the quarterly science   briefing.
If this is about what I said last night, I am truly sorry, sir.
So you didn't like my speech?
Exasperated, Adrian holds out the papers to him.
Can you please have a look at this, sir? It's really important.
Finally, Anheuser rips the papers out of his hands and st to walk away, reading. Suddenly he slows down.
Who wrote this?
An Indian astrophysicist I graduated with from Harvard and Prof. West, the preeminent geologist in the US.
Who else knows about it?
No one, sir.
Let's keep it that way, Helmsley.
Anheuser walks away.
G8 Summit. Riot police control the unruly crowd with wate cannons. We see PROTESTERS with Anti Globalization signs behind a fence. A convoy of limousines is approaching a historic building.

We follow the American delegation into the conference roo where the other G8 delegations are seated around an enorm table. The President of the United States, THOMAS F. WILSON, 56, doesn't sit down. He addresses the room and everybody goe quiet.
Good Morning...
For the first time we see the President's face. He is Afr American.
I hereby present a motion to meet privately with my seven fellow Heads of State, kindly excluding the rest of the delegates.
A murmur erupts. The Russian President SERGEY MAKARENKO, whispers to one of his interpreters.
Mr. Makarenko wishes to have his interpreters present.
President Wilson looks over to the Russian Colleague.
Mr. President, judging from the conversations we've had in the past, I can assure you, your English is absolutely fine, for what I have to say.

As the Russian President waves his interpreter away, all international delegates leave as well. The huge doors of the hall close. A secret service office the sound booth switches off the recording equipment to t chamber. The President gathers himself.
Six months ago I was made aware of a situation so devastating, that at first, I refused to believe it.
However through the concerted efforts of the brightest scientists of several nations, we have now confirmed its validity.
Dead silence.
The world as we know it, will soon come to an end.
A huge Chinese military helicopter blasts through a majes mountain valley in Tibet. We are at the top of the world.
A Chinese COLONEL, wearing dark sun glasses, watches from chopper as the army forces the evacuation of the villages monasteries.
(in Chinese) You will have new houses, electricity and running water...
Someone speaks on a megaphone in the village square as villagers are evicted by soldiers and herded into trucks.
... Some among you will even have the chance to work for the glorious People's Republic of China building the biggest dam project in the world...
NENG PANG, a young monk, 18, is loaded into a truck toget with his PARENTS, both in their 60's.
Neng's older brother, LIN PANG, 25, is part of a huge cro of young men and women staying behind by a Tibetan school building. He turns and yells after the truck.
I will send you money mother.
The Colonel with the dark glasses steps up, addressing th masses.
Who can read and write?
Eager hands fly up in the air. An official makes notes.
Who can weld?

Lin's hand shoots up in the air. We hear a siren echoing through the mountains and suddenly an explosion. Lin turn In the BACKGROUND, a series of explosions punch enormous holes into the side of the mountain, showering rock everywhere.
A MAN in a dark suit walks through a hallway of the Dorchester looking like your typical MI-6 agent. The deco plush and luxurious. He's stopped by two security men who frisk him.
Heavily ringed fingers flip through a folder.
Has his Highness had the opportunity to study the dossier?
A SAUDI PRINCE looks up and nods without expression.
You must understand I have a very big family. Mister...
Isaacs.
Mister Isaacs, one billion dollars is a lot of money.
I'm afraid the amount is in Euros, your Highness.

A group of dark figures in overalls walk past famous Renaissance paintings. They stop at the Mona Lisa. MANFRED PICARD, 63, head of the French National Museums, stands by LAURA, a young African-American woman in her la 20's. They observe the specialists opening the case of th famous painting. A whoosh of air as the vacuum seal breaks.
Laura, I'm putting a lot of trust in your people.
Laura answers in almost perfect French.
There are too many crazy people who could hurt her, Manfred. The World Heritage Foundation has done this all over the world.
In the BACKGROUND the Mona Lisa is taken off the wall and replaced with a perfect replica. Picard still looks uneas He watches as the real Mona Lisa is sealed into an airtig case.
And she'll be safe now? Tucked away in the Swiss Alps?
Perfectly safe.
Picard looks suspicious but says nothing. The CAMERA MOVE on the face of the fake Mona Lisa until all we see is her mysterious smile.
Lifeless bodies encircle a huge fire pit. They resemble t rays of the sun. In the background we see the famous step pyramids of Tikal.
... The mass suicide was discovered by a BBC documentary crew in the ancient Mayan city of Tikal...
Many of the dead are women and children looking peaceful are surrounded by colorful flowers.
... the victims were said to have adhered to the Mayan-Quiche Calender which predicts the end of time to occur on the 21st of December this year, due to the sun's destructive forces...
The CAMERA slowly pulls out and we are in--
A shabby apartment in Silverlake. The TV is on.
... Strangely enough, scientific records do support the fact that we are heading for the biggest solar climax in recorded history...
A small tremor rocks the apartment and the dishevelled fa of JACKSON CURTIS, 33, pops up from behind the couch. He asleep at his laptop last night.
Oh no. Not again.
One look at his watch and he is off running. He throws so clothes and a toothbrush in a bag. His cell phone rings.
Hello?... What do you mean? I'm not late. It's not even 10:30...

Jackson turns off the TV and darts towards the door, stop only to slide his laptop into a knapsack. As he turns, he stumbles over a stack of books, all shrink-wrapped and identically titled: `Farewell Atlantis'.
Damn it! (into the phone) Kate, I'm on my way... For god's sake...
Frustrated, he kicks them out of his way and exits. We ho on the books and realize that Jackson's photograph is on their back covers.
The phone call continues as Jackson opens the garage door struggling to pack his old SUV with camping equipment.
They're kids, Kate, going on vacation. It's not a doctor's appointment... it's supposed to be fun. You remember that, right? Fun?
He tries to start the engine, but the battery is dead. Frustrated, he hits the steering wheel.
Jackson runs across the street with his camping equipment throwing it into the trunk of a stretch limo parked by th curb.
... I know it's mosquito season at Yellowstone, Kate. I'll pick some up on the way.
He notices a deep crack in the asphalt. His neighbors, an elderly couple, stand there and stare at it.
Merrill, we should move back to Wisconsin.
Jackson gets into the limo and speeds off.
Jackson drives through LA with the radio on.
... Those shake-proof coffee mugs are a genius idea, and they just show the true nature of us Californians.
We pass a family frantically loading boxes into a van.
We'll not bow to little inconveniences like these so called `mini-quakes'...
Jackson passes a man in a wheelchair. He's holding up a cardboard sign: `Repent - The End is Near'.
Jackson stops and honks in front of an upscale Westwood h
... If you have a funny `mini-quake' story you wanna share, call Lisa & Randy at 1-800...
Jackson switches the radio off. Two kids NOAH, 10, and LI 7, come running down the driveway. They slow down, as the see the limo.
Jackson, what is this?
Don't call me Jackson, Noah, I'm your father.
Lilly yells from inside the limo.
Noah! Look! Daddy's got Space-Busters in the car... and Space-Busters 2. Awesome!
Their mother, KATE CURTIS, 32, a beautiful woman appears.
So what, you're a chauffeur now? What happened to the temp work?
This is better hours for me. Means I can still write.
Of course.
Kate's new boyfriend, GORDON SILBERMAN, 43, pulls out of garage in his Porsche wearing his Bluetooth.
(on the phone) Simone, how many times have I told you, we don't do Lipo on Fridays. It's too messy.
Jackson smiles bitterly. Gordon waves at the kids.
Have fun guys. And watch out for those bears. (to Jackson) Nice car.
Jackson waves grudgingly as Gordon pulls away.
Noah needs to read twenty pages from his book each day...
She follows Jackson to the car with a bag of pull-up diap
... and Lilly has to put these on, before she goes to sleep.
Still?
He shuts the trunk and gets back behind the wheel. She lo at him seriously.
Jackson, they've been really looking forward to this you know. Don't let them down.
He nods as the car pulls away.

HARRY HELMSLEY, 73, and his partner TONY DELGADO, 68, boa an enormous cruise ship, the `Freedom of the Seas'. Harry African-American, Tony is Italian. He carries a large cas They pass a poster: `Jazz Night with Harry Helmsley & Ton Delgado'.
So this time we'll hit the Japs.
So what?
Well Tony, electronics are cheap there and... you could visit your boy Will.
Afternoon ladies...
TONY shoots a charmers smile at a couple of older single ladies on sun loungers. They smile back coyly.
Are you even listening to me?
Yes unfortunately I am Harry.
I heard from Audrey you're a grandpa now.
Why don't you keep your nose out of my family. You're cramping my style.
He married a Japanese girl - how is that the end of the world? You should at least go see him.
Why? Do you see your boy?
Not as much as I'd like. DC is a long way. But at least we talk.
What about?
Life, how short it is...

Suddenly they're thrown off balance by a large swell that pulls the massive `Freedom of the Seas' away from the landing, about ten yards. The next moment, the ship slams back against the dock wit earthshaking BOOM.
What the hell was that?
A murmur goes through the crowd. Luckily nobody is injure
The phone rings twice before Laura switches on a light. W catch a glimpse of a framed photo of her and Adrian. She answers the phone.
Laura? They lied to us.
Manfred is that you?
Picard is speeding in his Peugeot, anxiously checking his rear view mirror.
I had my suspicions. I should have said something. They are following me.
Who is?
They may be listening to us too. Laura the Heritage Foundation is a sham.
Picard's car approaches a tunnel.
What?
The art you collected, it's not in the Alps.
The Peugeot enters a tunnel.
Then where is it?
A huge blast rips through the tunnel as his car explodes.
(singing along to the
`We all live in a Yellow Submarine...'

They're driving through the glorious landscape of Yellows National Park. Noah sits in the back with headphones on playing Space-Busters 2. As they pass over a ridge, the music station is overpower by a talk show filtering through. We hear a raspy and excitable voice.
... After what is going on in La-La- land with all those surface cracks, I told myself: Get your stupid ass to Yellowstone. I don't want to miss all the great fun, when it finally blows...
Lilly reaches for the dial of the radio.
What happened to the music?
Hang on, sweet pea, let daddy listen to this for a moment...
Jackson corrects the dial to get better reception.
... There's been government people flying in and out all morning. And trust me, they did not look happy...
A huge black helicopter brushes over the limo.
... Folks, always remember, you heard it first from Charlie.
They watch in awe as the chopper disappears behind a ridg
Laura bursts in and heads straight for the TV. The Presid looks up from his desk.
You have to see this.
Sally the President's Secretary enters, flustered.
It's alright Sally.
Sally closes the door as Laura turns up the TV.
... Mr. Picard had been the director of the French National Museums for 24 years. As fate would have it his assassination took place in the same Paris tunnel where Princess Diana died in 1997.
The President comes around his desk. Laura looks at him distraught.
I just talked to him, Dad. He told me the world Heritage Foundation is a sham. Is that true?
The President shoots an anxious look across the room. Lau turns and suddenly realizes that Adrian is standing in th corner.
You knew too? You sleep with me and you didn't say anything?
Adrian looks ashamed.
I can't even look at you. Either of you!
Honey, calm down.
A man was killed! I want the truth Dad. Right now.
A dense forest trail. We hear Lilly before we see her.
Daddy, where are we going?
To a very special place, Lil'bee. It's a lake. A place where mommy and daddy fell in love. (winking to Noah) Remember the book I gave you?
I don't want to know where you and mom had sex. I'm not ready for that, Jackson.
I'm your dad, Noah.
Daddy!
Jackson runs to catch up with Lilly who has reached a fen with a `keep out' sign posted.
This wasn't here before.
Jackson starts to climb the fence.
Don't you see the signs?
It's fine guys.
Jackson and his kids crest a ridge. They look down on a parched basin with cracked terrain.
It's gone. The whole darn lake is gone. I swear you guys there was a lake here.
The kids roll their eyes.

A puddle of water is all that remains of the lake. Jackso and the kids walk into the basin, unaware of being watche THROUGH BINOCULARS. Jackson spots an electronic measuring device and crouches have a closer look. Elsewhere in the lake bed, we see sand seeping through CR in the ground.
Jackson!
When he looks up, he sees heavily armed soldiers coming towards them from all sides.
It's okay, Noh'.
Through the BINOCULARS, we see Jackson and his kids arres and led over a ridge. With this we reveal an ENORMOUS RESEARCH FACILITY with hundreds of tents and vehicles surrounding a massive dril tower.
Adrian Helmsley and Prof. West exit the drilling tower, b studying papers. Adrian notices Jackson and his kids near being interrogated by an OFFICER.
I'll be with you in a second, Professor.
Adrian walks towards them. Jackson stares at the officer defiance.
... And then you climbed over a posted fence? Just like that?
I told you.
Isn't this supposed to be a National Park? There shouldn't be fences. What are you guys doing around here anyway?
We're geologists...
Jackson turns and sees Adrian standing there.
I'll handle this officer. Thank you.
The officer reluctantly hands him Jackson's license.
So, where did the lake go?
That's what we're trying to find out. We think this whole area has become potentially unstable. I would advise you to take your kids and leave, Mr...
He throws a look at Jackson's drivers license.
... Curtis.
He looks up at Jackson with renewed interest.
Are you by any chance the Jackson Curtis, the author of `Farewell Atlantis'?
Yeah, that's me.
Jackson straightens up proudly. Lilly smiles.
What a coincidence. I'm reading your book, as we speak... first third, around day 300, when the shuttle loses communication with earth and drifts off into space.
You're one of lucky 422 who bought it.
Actually I didn't buy it. My father gave it to me.
Oh, I see.
Prof. West waves at Adrian from one of the container labs Adrian hands back Jackson his drivers license.
Officer, can you return them to the campgrounds, please. (to Jackson) Pleasure to meet you, Mr. Curtis.
Jackson and his kids look after Adrian hurrying away.
He was very nice.
Yes he was, Lil'bee.
Jackson and the kids walk back to the campgrounds when suddenly CHARLIE FROST, 62, a crazy looking guy with binoculars around his neck, stands in their way.
What did the government guys tell you?
Jackson looks at him, instinctively picking up Lilly.
They think it's not such a good idea to climb over their fences. They feel the area is unstable.
Charlie bursts out laughing.
Unstable! Ha-ha! They say its unstable! That's funny...
With this he turns around and leaves.
Jackson is sitting on a camp chair, right outside the ten He's on his laptop, looking enquiringly at an aerial pict of Yellowstone on Google earth. In the background we see the kids are in the tent.
There are mosquitos in here. Did anybody spray the tent?
Jackson looks up, remembering he forgot the spray.
We'll get some of that tomorrow. For tonight just put your head under the blankie.
Daddy you said you weren't gonna work on your book.
I'm not Honey, I promise. Are you wearing your pull-ups?
Lilly nods as Jackson walks over and tucks her into bed. kisses her good night. He turns and is surprised to see N typing a text on his cell phone.
Did mommy buy you that?
No... Gordon gave it to me for my birthday.
Jackson takes the phone from out of Noah's hands.
Noah. Things like a cell phone have to be discussed in the family.
What family?
Jackson reads the message Noah has typed `Hey Gordon, Cam Sucks!'. Hurt, Jackson hands back the phone.
Go to sleep guys.
Commotion. The base packs up. Adrian and Prof. West duck as they board a chopper. Adrian is on the phone.
... You have to immediately inform the President, Mr Anheuser. The readings look much worse than I expected.
Plus Satnam's neutrino figures from India confirm...
We hear Anheuser, yelling.
... But you guys said...
We were wrong! By five or six months...
A second later the chopper lifts off.

Jackson has his laptop open with the cursor blinking away the words `Chapter Seven'. But he can't concentrate on writing after what Noah has said. A chopper flies overhead. Jackson follows it's path over campsite and his eyes fall on an American flag fluttering top of a massive radio antennae. This belongs to an RV tr Through the RV's window, Jackson sees the silhouette of Charlie Frost, the guy with the binoculars, speaking into microphone. Curious, Jackson flicks on the radio and twists the dial.
(Charlie's voice) ... We have a listener calling in. Bill from Cooke City, you're on the Charlie Frost Show. (Bill's voice) I wanted to know, where will this all start?
Jackson is intrigued. He puts his laptop down.
(Charlie's voice) Well, something like this could only originate in Hollywood, Ha-Ha! But seriously, they've got the earth cracking under their asses already, Bill.
Jackson climbs out of his car and starts towards the RV. can still hear the radio.
(Bill's voice) Our family believes in the gospel of our Lord Jesus.
We have nothing to fear, Charlie. (Charlie's voice) Good for you Bill, good for you!
Charlie hits a switch. Music starts playing. The Doors, ` End'.
... This is Charlie Frost reporting live from Yellowstone National Park, soon to become the world's largest active volcano.
Charlie is about to take a bite of his sandwich, when the a knock on the door. Jackson sticks his head in.
Hi. Mind if I join you?
I only got a few minutes.
Charlie bites into his sandwich as Jackson looks around a all the equipment.
I just heard part of your broadcast... Mind me asking a question? What exactly is it... that will start in Hollywood?
Actually it's gonna be the whole west coast...
What are you talking about?
The apocalypse, the end of days. The Mayans knew it, the I Ching and the Bible, kind of...
Charlie looks at his watch.
I got to eat... Just check my blog. You can download it for free.
Charlie clicks on his laptop.
... However, we do take donations.
A crudely animated film starts to play. Charlie narrates screen in an overly dramatic fashion.
In the year 2012 a cataclysmic event will unfold. Caused by an alignment of the planets in our solar system that only happens every 640,000 years... Just imagine the earth as an Orange...
Charlie appears as an animated figure holding an orange.
... our sun will begin to emit such extreme amounts of radiation, that the core of the earth will melt - that's the inside part of the Orange, leaving the crust of our planet free to shift.
On screen the middle of the orange shrinks, now the skin moves freely around it.
In 1958, Prof. Hapgood named it `Earth Crust Displacement'...
A faded portrait of a scientist appears on screen.
... and Albert Einstein endorsed it...
The infamous photo of Einstein, sticking out his tongue.
The forces of mother nature will be so devastating it will bring an end to this world on winter solstice 12-21-12.
The film ends with an image of the whole earth covered wi water. Charlie shuts the laptop.
Pretty neat, huh? It's a big hit on YouTube. I did the animation myself.
I know what you're thinking. But all the governments know about this.
If they all knew, don't you think somebody would tell us?
They can't. Just think about it. First the stockmarket would crash...
Charlie opens a can of beer. Phsssh!
Then the economy... boom. The dollar... boom. And then the people in the streets... (mimicking gun fire) Boom, boom! Pandemonium, revolution, war! They would never tell us. Beer?
Jackson shakes his head still struggling to digest this.
Only if you're some Sheik, Bill Gates, or maybe one of those Russian billionaires do you stand a chance to buy a seat.
A seat?
They're building spaceships, man.
Oh... I see.
No really... One of my listeners, a geography professor at UTSC, has even figured out where they're building them. He sent me a map.
Well... Charlie, I think I gotta go. My kids are sleeping.
Charlie looks at him bug eyed.
Get them out of Yellowstone, man. It's gonna get ugly here.
Night, Charlie.
As Jackson exits, Charlie gets back on the air.
Sorry for the delay, folks. But even in times like these, a man has got to eat...

Westwood. The parking lot of Gelson's is nearly empty. Eerie silence. Suddenly some of the cars begin to shift i place from an unseen force. A small CRACK creases the asp and slowly crawls towards the brightly lit supermarket.
Muzak is playing. Kate and her boyfriend Gordon are shopp late. She picks up some pull-ups for Lilly, Gordon steps behind her, wrapping his arms around her waist.
Why don't we make a baby?
He reaches up and touches her breasts.
Stop it! We're in public.
Gordon lets go of her with mock disappointment.
Honey, I created them. And now suddenly I can't touch them?

Kate pushes him away and moves on. A few customers are paying at the checkout stand. BEHIND THEM: Huge glass windows reveal cars slowly slidin into the ever widening crack in the parking lot. Nobody inside notices. Gordon catches up with Kate.
You always act strange after he shows up?
Just because I don't care for your arrogant humor doesn't mean I'm acting strange. He is the father of my kids.

Maybe biologically. Can I remind you what that guy did? First you gave up med school to have Noah... Then you practically raise him and Lilly by yourself while he sat glued to a laptop writing that junk.
Some of his stuff is actually... He's published Gordon.
Yeah, published! You know your mother was right. You've always been drawn to guys with lofty dreams and empty pockets. But not this time right, sweetheart?
Kate smiles awkwardly and picks up a can of soup. The she in front of her shakes for a moment.
Did you see that?
See what?
Kate slowly puts the cans of soup into her cart and looks around. Gordon senses a problem between them.
You know Kate, we have to keep working at this... our relationship. Because I won't end up being just a re-run of you and Jackson.
I mean Honey, I feel like... something is pulling us apart?

Before Gordon finishes his sentence-- A violent ROAR! From front to back, the entire supermarke rips open right between Kate and Gordon. The few customers scream in horror at the sight of the hu crevasse forming beneath them. Kate and Gordon are thrown against opposite aisles holding on for dear life. They cling to the columns as the shelves fold into the ev widening crack...
Jackson puts down some groceries at the checkout.
Just stop scratching. You'll get them infected.
He smiles at the female cashier behind the counter who do not look friendly.
Something for Mosquito bites please?
Before or after?
What?
The woman looks at Lilly and Noah with their red lumps.
I'd get before and after.
She slams two mosquito products on the counter.
Look! Mrs. Birnbaum, my teacher is on TV!
On the store's TV: A heavy-set blonde WOMAN, 45, speaking a reporter in front of Gelson's.
That's our supermarket.
The gap in the ground is enormous now, at least half a mi long and 200 feet wide.
Kids, we have to pack up and go find mommy.
President Wilson and Anheuser walk towards the Situation Room.
Sir, you have to initiate the boarding process immediately.
Is this even possible? What's our information from China?
They estimate four of the ships will be ready for launch.
The President is shocked by this news.
Only four?
If it's alright with you sir, I'll brief the panel about the new development.
I'd rather have Adrian do that. They trust him. I told him to be in on the meeting.
Anheuser fumes as they enter the situation room.
Flat screens line the walls. A video conference is under with each of the G8 members represented.
Ladies and Gentlemen, we all knew this day would come. But we never imagined it would come this soon.
He looks over to Adrian.
I would like to pass this over to my science advisor, Adrian Helmsley.
Adrian steps up and gathers himself. Anheuser watches.
I'll make this brief...
Pointing to a set of charts.

... According to our latest data from Yellowstone, the temperature of the subterranean crust of the earth, the cement that holds our landmass in place, is increasing at a rapid rate, much faster than anticipated...
All the heads of state are glued to his words.
... This causes extreme polar instability. The magnetic fields have decreased by more than 80% over the last 48 hours.
The German Chancellor, a woman, interrupts.
How much time do we have, Mr. Helmsley?
Adrian glances to Professor West, standing in the back.
Two, maybe three days if we're lucky.
The Prime Minister of Italy breaks in, upset.
How can you speak about luck in such a situation?
Apologies Prime minster. He's still new to the job.
President Wilson steps up.
Nevertheless, Mr. Antonioni, we have to make an immediate decision.
We hear CHEERING and APPLAUSE.
Introducing the 320 pound muscle machine from the Ukraine...

location: BOXING ARENA OF MGM GRAND/LAS VEGAS

text: The arena is filled to its max. The crowd is on its feet.
... and tonight's challenger for the heavy weight world championship of the world. Here he is... Mister Zultan Balashin!

The crowd ROARS as the boxer and his entourage enter. The CAMERA moves in on a tall man with blonde clean cut h He is well built, wearing designer clothing from head to YURI KARPOV, 45, stereotypical Russian oligarch. He approaches the ringside corner and whistles.
Zultan!
The nervous boxer turns.
(in Russian) Ah, finally, Yuri. I thought I would not see you.
Yuri hits the boxer's gloves. Zultan is nervous. His coac steps in.
He needs to concentrate now, Mister Karpov.
You shut up... when I talk to my boy, understand?
Yes, Mr. Karpov.
Good... That is good. (in Russian to the
Zultan my friend. Do not forget. We are fighters. We never go down. We always stay on our feet...
Zultan just keeps nodding, pumping himself up.
... No matter who is hitting us. No matter how hard.
GONG. First Round. The fight is on.
Now, go kill the bastard.

Yuri walks to his seat, sitting down next to his trophy: TAMARA, 28, blonde, wears the shortest mini one can imagi designer shoes, handbag, glasses and boobs. In her lap sh holds CAESAR, a tiny dog wearing a diamond collar. In the ring the boxers maul at each other. Yuri's cell ph beeps. It's a text message:
Yuri's whole demeanor changes. Without a word, he gets up walks out of the arena.
Yuri bear... where are you going?
Yuri does not respond as he squeezes through the crowd. Zultan, the boxer, notices Yuri leave. In that split seco distraction, he is hit HARD and goes down for the count. The crowd ROARS!
Jackson has driven all night. The sun rises, a giant glow orb.
... Caltech believes that the incident in the Westwood supermarket has released most of the surface tension...
Jackson pulls up. The kids are asleep.
... It looks like life in the city will soon be back to normal, Mayor Gonzales said at an early morning news conference from his home in Hancock Park.
Jackson switches off the radio and wakes his kids gently.
Lilly, we're home sweetie. (to Noah) Wake up big man.
Kate heads to the car. Still sleepy, the kids grab their stuff and run into her arms.
Oh honey, I'm so glad you're back... And you too, darling.
We tried calling but -
I'm hungry Mummy.
At least it looks like the Mosquitos ate well.
She looks at Jackson and softens.
Wanna come in?
Gordon appears at the door. Jackson watches painfully as runs and gives Gordon a big hug. His cellphone beeps with a message.
Where are you Curtis?
Yuri stands at a huge window overlooking the strip talkin into his phone.
Back in Westwood, Mister Karpov.
Good. That is good. I'm sending the Gulfstream to pick up Alec and Oleg.
Tamara hovers in the background packing her Louis Vuitton luggage. Caesar, her little dog, watches from the bed.
(in Russian) Tell him to bring Caesar's raincoat, it's in the Range Rover.
Yuri brushes her off.
While talking to Yuri, Jackson is standing in front of th open trunk, changing into his chauffeur suit.
Curtis, make sure you get my boys as fast you can.
A palatial home. Completely gaudy. The twins, ALEC and OL wait impatiently. They are 12 years old and wear identica clothing by Dior.
Curtis, you are late.
Jackson ignores him and starts throwing the luggage into limo. The other twin notices his muddy sneakers.
Careful with our stuff. Don't get it dirty.
Ahead of the limo a crowd has formed in the streets, sing songs and chanting about the end of days. A SKINNY MAN wi ponytail preaches from the scriptures.
... There will be famines, pestilences and earthquakes, sayeth the Lord.
Jackson has to maneuver through the people. Banners read: `Prepare for the End'-- 'You cannot escape his judgement' Alec looks up from his video game, annoyed.
Curtis, can't you go faster?
Are you guys blind? I can't run people over.
Why not? They're idiots anyway.
Jackson shoots these spoilt brats an angry look.
Jackson stops in front of the Gulfstream. SASHA, 40, Yuri Russian pilot is expecting them.
Hey Jackson. Took you a while...
Jackson mutters under his breath as he unloads the luggag dropping one of them on Alec's foot on purpose.
Ouch! Be more careful!
The other twin has noticed Jackson's intensions. He gets his face.
Now you're laughing, Curtis. But we are going on a big ship.
We will live... and you will die.

Oleg grins back at Jackson as the jet door closes. The Gulfstream taxis onto the runway. As Jackson turns back to the car a fine surface crack sho across the tarmac. We hold on his face as it hits him lik ton of bricks:

head_text.subj: THE CRAZY RADIO HOST, CHARLIE FROST WAS RIGHT

text: Frantically Jackson looks around and spots a MAN in overa working on a twin engine Cessna. He runs to him.
Where can I rent a plane?
The man points to a shabby office building.
Kate is in her kitchen cooking breakfast for the kids. Go watches the Governor on the news.
(with Austrian
... just this morning my people at Caltech told me that in the last 36 hours we had basically zero earthquake activity in Southern California, which is very rare...
The phone rings. Kate picks up.
Jackson drives like crazy.
... Kate, we have to get out of LA! I've rented a plane for us. Get the kids ready! I'll be there in five.
The kids have plans today...
Are you kidding me!
No I'm not! Noah has music at 2 and Lil' has Karate.
Gordon rolls his eyes and mutters.
Not that we'd expect him to remember.
California is going down! Pack up the kids!
You're crazy! The Governor just said we're fine now.
The Governor's a meathead, how would he know anything? Kate listen! You gotta trust me over some politician. Come on.
Kate slams the phone down. Lilly stops eating.
Mommy, why are you so angry with Daddy?
Because your daddy is a lunatic, darling.
On the TV, the interview comes to an end.
... it looks to me, like the worst is over.

That moment a MASSIVE QUAKE hits Los Angeles. Everybody dives under the table. ON TV: The news casters and the Governor do the same. A f seconds later the signal cuts out. Gordon pulls Kate and the kids close as the earth shakes violently for 20 seconds.
Jackson flies into the driveway and runs into the house.
When he enters, Lilly immediately runs into his arms. The next tremor hits. Cracks form on the kitchen floor.
We have to leave! Noah, let's go!
I think we're safer here!
Noah, now! Kate please...
The whole house rides up and down like on a wave.
I think he's right.
Finally Kate pushes her son out from under the table. The all scramble out of the house in a panic. Kate is cut on shoulder by falling glass but she hardly notices.
As they storm out of their front door the house crumbles behind them.
Get in the car!
The whole street starts to buckle. Left and right the hou are shaken and smashed like toys.
Just before the wave of destruction can reach them, Jacks tears out of the driveway.
Jackson maneuver's the limo through the crumbling neighborhood. Right in front of their eyes, streets disappear, trees fall, electrical lines snap. Sewer pipes burst in front of the car.
Holy shit!
Jackson has to turn on the windshield wipers.
The limo crashes through a gate onto the tarmac, coming t stop in front of a twin engine Cessna.
Damn it! Where's the pilot?
Kate turns to Gordon.
Gordon, you know how to fly.
I... had a couple lessons...
Did you cover taking off?
Yeah.
That's good enough for me.
They start running, when Jackson remembers something and heads back to the Limo. He grabs his knapsack from the front seat fumbling to zip laptop back inside it. Kate shouts.
Jackson, what are you doing?
I'm coming.
He jumps out of the car and races back after them. Behind Jackson the hangar starts to disintegrate.
A gigantic fissure forms in the earth, shooting towards S Monica airport. Gordon fumbles with the controls, Jackson yells from the copilot seat.
Come on, come on...
(pointing at the
But I'm supposed to check all these first...

Jackson reaches over and slams Gordon's hand down and the plane lurches forward. As the Cessna speeds onto the tarmac the control tower go down and explodes. Noah discovers the giant crevasse forming behind them.
Guys, behind us!
As the plane accelerates, the giant crack closes in on th Gordon's hand trembles on the throttle control. Everybody screams on top of each other.
Gordon! Damn it! Lift off!

Gordon gathers his courage and pulls the lever. The plane almost rockets into the air just as the ground beneath th gives way. They hover for a moment, almost caught in mid-air as the widening crevasse beneath them fights to suck them into t bowels of the earth. Gordon fights to maintain control bu they begin to be pulled down. The daylight vanishes. Debris and mud smashes into the pl from all sides. The canyon walls erupt.
I can't get it up!
Taking desperate measures, Gordon nearly rips the control stick out of its joint - with a lurch the Cessna lifts ou the abyss.

They all take a deep breath only to realize that now they flying directly into the collapsing towers of downtown Lo Angeles! Like a roller coaster, Gordon manages to weave the little plane through the tumbling high rises. They dive one last time to evade the plummeting US BANK TOWER, the tallest building on the west coast. All are dead silent as they watch the whole of Los Angele crumble beneath them. Kate covers Lilly's eyes.
(in total shock) That was amazing, Gordon!
Jackson looks at Kate and notices her cut.
Are you okay?
(brushing it off) I'm fine. How did you know this was gonna happen?
I didn't. (To Gordon) Do we have enough fuel to make it to Yellowstone?
The plane veers off in a northeasterly direction. Behind the destruction of Los Angeles continues.
The gigantic cruise ship plows through the Pacific. We he lounge music...
Adrian's father Harry and his partner Tony are on stage. Harry on the piano, singing, Tony playing the bass. A wai brings drinks. Water for Harry, and a brightly colored cocktail for Tony.
You got fans Tony...
Tony raises his glass to two old ladies who are sitting a the bar.
There's a call for you Harry. Want me to take a message?
(while still playing) I'll be right there.
The waiter nods. A few more bars of music, then applause.
(into the microphone) Thank you ladies and gentlemen. Let's hear it for the one and only Tony Delgado... And I'm Harry Helmsley and we'll be back after a short pit stop.
Applause. Harry rushes off stage.
Dad... what I have to tell you is very serious...
Adrian is standing in a dark corner. Behind him people ar packing up, carrying boxes.
You remember when I told you about the dam in China? Well, it's happening much sooner than we anticipated.
Harry's face has turned serious.
The President has ordered us to clear out the White House.
Hah... About time someone cleaned up that mess.
Adrian fights back the tears.
Where are you, dad? What exactly is the course of the `Freedom' right now?...
It's all good, Adrian. Don't worry about your old man. You have more important things to do now.
There's a tremor in Harry's voice.
You know, your mom and I, we had a hell of a great life... and a hell of a great kid too.
And the `Freedom' is a pretty big ship you know... Don't write your old man off, just yet.
A tear runs down Adrian's face.
... Besides, I could never leave Tony alone. You know how he can't keep decent time by himself.
Pause.
I love you, dad.
Harry bites his lip.
Love you too, son.
Back in the lounge, Tony has finished his cocktail. Harry walks up and hollers at the barkeeper.
Hey Herb. Get me a double Jack on the rocks.
After twenty-five years on the wagon?
Why not? Who cares how long we do certain things? How long we drink booze, how long we talk to people... Or how long we don't talk to people.
Harry grabs Tony by his shirt.
Woah!... Harry, what's the matter with you? Let's go. We're back on.
Harry pulls him even closer.
Call your kid, you stubborn old ass.
I'm not going back on that stage unless you promise to call him.
Tony, the ladies are waiting for you.
Promise me, Tony... please.
Harry stares him down.
Yeah, maybe I should call him...
Harry smiles, downs his bourbon and walks back on stage.
Adrian enters his office. The TV is on.
... There is little we know at this point, but the earthquake registered at 10.1 on the Richter scale. The whole of the Western seaboard was hit...
Assistants stare at the news in shocked disbelief, some o them are crying. Prof. West appears at the door.
(pointing at the TV) Have you seen this?
Prof. West silently nods and beckons Adrian, who follows down the hall into a dark control room. They look at a wa sized high def monitor.
We have satellite images. Here's the sequence we've got so far.
On the monitors, detailed satellite imagery displays how monstrous quake unfolds, leaving California sliding into sea.
Any news from Yellowstone?
Anytime now.
The base is abandoned but for a few structures and the enormous drilling tower. Gordon manages to land the plane next to what looks like fueling station. Jackson leaps out checking the pump.
Guys, there's fuel! Fill her up and I'll look for Charlie.
You're sure about this?
Kate, everything this guy said so far has happened. I'll be right back.
Jackson runs off towards the hills.
Daddy wait! I wanna come with you!
Lilly runs after him. Jackson picks her up.
Lilly! Come back!
It's fine! I'll take her.
Kate watches as they disappear, worried. Noah and Gordon started to fuel the plane.

Jackson and Lilly find Charlie's RV with it's door hangin open. They enter. The key is in the ignition. The radio transmitters are on, but Charlie is gone. Jackson fiddles with the switches and Charlie's voice comes on.
... I am standing here at the highest point on what is the rim of this super volcano...
He's got to be close by, Lil'bee...
Jackson jumps behind the wheel and turns the ignition.
Let's go back, Daddy.
Listen to me. We have to find Charlie. He's got a secret map, you know, like Jack Sparrow in `Pirates'.
That catches her interest.
Lil', we have to work as a team now, okay? You have to help me.
Jackson passes her his mobile phone. Lilly nods. He throw the RV into gear and they speed off over the bumpy terrai In their dust, we see the earth fissuring!
Jackson drives like a bat out of hell.
... The last time this baby blew, was 640,000 years ago...
Dial Mommy's number, sweetheart.
Jackson tears up the mountain looking for Charlie.
Kate's phone rings.
Hi mommy...
Where are you, honey!?
Jackson hears the stress in Kate's voice. He hisses at Li
Tell her we'll be back in ten minutes.
We're looking for a secret map, mommy.
Jackson grimaces.
Kate tries to keep it together for Lilly.
Let me speak to your daddy, darling.
Daddy can't talk right now, he's driving really fast...
The RV runs over a boulder. Lilly hits the roof.
Ouch!
LILLY!
In the background Kate hears the voice of Charlie Frost.
... I tell you guys, any minute now... any minute the fireworks will start...
Who's in the car with you? Who's that man screaming?
He's not in the car. He's on a mountain waiting for fireworks.
Lilly spots Charlie way up on a ridge. He has erected his foot radio antenna with the flag fluttering on top.
(to Jackson) There he is! Up there!
You're the best, darling. Give Daddy the phone... (into the phone) Kate I am sorry, I can't talk...
The road ends just below the mountain peak.
Bring back my child, Jackson! NOW!
Jackson sees Charlie up above, broadcasting. He hangs up phone and jumps out of the RV.
You wait here for me! You watch the ship while Captain Curtis talks to the pirate. Okay?
Okay...
Jackson climbs up to Charlie.
Charlie has his broadcasting equipment strapped to his bo The antenna's flag is whipping in the wind.
(into his mic) ... I wish you guys at home could see this on TV...
He notices Jackson and muffles the microphone.
How did you make it up here? Thought you were toast.
The spaceships Charlie, where are they?
You can't make it there.
We have a plane. We can get you out of here too. Let's go Charlie!
All around the landscape begins to collapse. A three mile crater forms, revealing the awe-inspiring sight of the su volcano.
You'll never make it out in time. Just stay and enjoy the big bang. That your kid?
Jackson discovers Lilly standing behind him, staring at Charlie with her big brown eyes. Jackson grabs Charlie lifting him off the ground.
Where is that god damn map!
Easy, easy. Watch the mic... I don't know. Somewhere in my camper.
A low rumble builds to a rapturous thunder as MILLIONS OF BIRDS tear into flight.
Wow! Look at that!... (into his mic) Fly birdies fly! This marks the last day of the United States of America folks and by tomorrow...
The mouth of the volcano starts to break apart revealing molten lava underneath.
... the last of mankind. Soon they'll see us from a million miles away, out there in the milky way...
Jackson grabs his wide eyed daughter and races down the mountain.
Jackson and Lilly jump into the RV and races off, with Charlie's broadcast still playing.
... The ash cloud will travel everywhere.
First the lights will go out in Vegas, then Dallas, St. Louis and then Washington DC...
Jackson's cell phone rings and he picks up.
We're on our way.
Jackson, things are really looking bad here!

In that instant, the air around them vanishes, as if suck from the landscape into a vacuum. THE BIGGEST EXPLOSION THE WORLD HAS EVER SEEN... At least the last 640,000 years. To them, all this occurs in total silence. The sound of t eruption has not reached them yet. They are frozen, unable to comprehend what is happening.
The explosion begins to resembles an atomic mushroom.
... it's beautiful, kids! Just beautiful!
The sound waves reach Charlie, throwing him to the ground
The RV flies over the rugged terrain. Everywhere the eart cracking, falling apart. Jackson struggles to swerve arou the disappearing landscape.
It's following us!
Lilly has discovered the expanding ASH CLOUD behind them.
Just don't look back, Lil'bee!
The THUNDERING sound envelopes them! On the radio, the vo of Charlie is getting shrill.
Majestic!... Oh yeah!
Charlie slowly tries to stand again, silhouetted against cloud of dust and fire towering above him. Flaming rocks fly towards him. When they hit the ground, detonate like fire bombs.
Oh baby! It's coming!
Rocks plummet like comets around the RV as Jackson races a collapsing bridge. On the radio, in his delirious state Charlie begins to sing...
`This is the end, my friend'...
Yellowstone looks like a war zone. The RV dodges the bombardment of fire and rock.
Huge tree trunks and glowing boulders fly at Charlie thro the ashes. He screams at the top of his lungs.
... Folks, always remember, you heard it first from Charlie.
A second later, Charlie's radio antenna comes spinning li scythe through the air. It decapitates Charlie in an inst
The radio cuts out. The forest and the camp grounds are m flat by the extreme force of the ASH CLOUD. In the rear v mirror Jackson sees it gaining on them.
LILLY! DOWN!
A firebomb hits the RV, ripping half the roof off. Lilly barely makes it under the dashboard.
Stay down there, Lil'! We're almost there! Just keep looking at daddy.
Jackson spots the little Cessna in the distance.
At the entrance to the airstrip a huge crevasse forms, cutting the RV off from reaching the plane. Lilly sticks out her head.
Mommy!
Jackson swerves wildly to miss the crack, sending Lilly flying out. Without thinking, he lets go of the wheel, lunging after her and pulling her back inside.
Stay down darling.

Jackson races the RV alongside the forming crack. Spotting a narrow point in the crevasse, he makes a decis Slamming the accelerator down, he races towards it at ful speed. Moments later the RV is airborne! Kate watches, too shocked to scream. A few drawn out seco Then the RV touches down, crashing 200 feet from the plan Kate runs towards the wreckage of the camper. Lilly jumps out, racing into her mom's arms. Jackson turns and sees t cloud approaching.
You guys go! I'll be right there!
Kate pulls Lilly back to the plane. Jackson jumps into the back of the RV scavenging through shelves, looking for Charlie's map. Kate lifts Lilly onto the wing of the plane. Gordon revs the engines.
Give me your hand, Lil'.
Noah pulls his little sister into the cockpit.
Fiery rocks rain from the sky, detonating to the right an left of their plane as Kate climbs in.
We have to take off!
No!
Where's daddy?!
Kate, I'm sorry but if we wait we'll all die!
Gordon pushes the throttle. The plane starts to move. Kat screams.
Gordon! Wait!

Back in the RV, Jackson is frantically going through the masses of books and papers on the shelves. Finally, a map unfolds it. But it's only of the London underground syste He throws it to the ground and finds another. This time h lucky! There are markings everywhere. As he races to the door, the ground gives way beneath the Kate and the kids watch it disappear from sight.
JACKSON! NO!

Noah begins to cry and Lilly clings to her mom. Gordon ju stares, paralyzed. The ASH CLOUD is almost upon them! Gordon takes action and accelerates the plane. Kate turns back. A hand emerges from the crevasse. Then another, holding a map. Her face lights up.
It's daddy!
Jackson pulls himself up and sprints towards them, the ma his hand.
Jackson! Here!
Kate leans out of the cockpit reaching for him.
Faster Dad. You can make it!
Kate, grab him for god sake. We're almost out of runway.

Using every last ounce of energy, Jackson leaps onto the and is yanked into the plane by Kate. Just at that moment, the plane lifts off. Jackson falls into the cockpit, completely out of breath. Lilly crawls over and hugs him.
Thanks for waiting guys.

Now all eyes are glued to the speedometer. 180... 190... The violent ASH CLOUD is hitting their tail rudder. The p swerves wildly! Gordon gets it back under control. The speedometer finally creeps towards 200 mph and the CL slowly falls back. Everybody breathes a sigh of relief.
So, now that you got your map, where are we going?
Jackson unfolds it and takes a look. Hundreds of markings clutter the map. In the left corner he discovers a large letter C followed by H - I - N - A. He looks up.
We're gonna need a bigger plane.
The White House is being evacuated. Amidst the chaos stan Anheuser. Adrian puts down a phone and looks at him.
Just a few minutes ago Yellowstone erupted, sir. The ash cloud will reach Washington in roughly 7 hours. Maybe 6. We have strong easterly winds...
And the crustal displacement?
No one knows, sir.
Anheuser starts walking, Adrian trails behind.
Let's get the government airborne and... I mean now.
Anheuser and Adrian burst into the Anteroom of the Oval Office. The President's secretary, SALLY, 55, is packing.
Where is the President, Sally?
Sally looks up stone faced.
He said he wanted to spend a few minutes alone. I think he's over at the chapel.
The whole North American continent is about to perish, and Wilson decides to go to church!
Adrian shoots an angry look at Anheuser.
He's praying sir. Which considering the circumstances is not a bad idea.
Maybe. But right now I need the leader of the free world off his knees and on Air Force One. Wheels up 1900 hours. Can I leave that with you Helmsley?
Anheuser walks away. Adrian and Sally exchange a look.
I really don't like that man.
Adrian finds the President standing near the front of the chapel.
Mr. President? We need to get you out of Washington immediately.
President Wilson stays with his head bowed.
Now matter how idealistic you are taking office. You lose your innocence behind that desk.
Laura was right. People have died because of the decisions I made.
That's not your fault sir.
He turns to face Adrian.
You sound like Anheuser.
This quietly affects Adrian.
Laura's never looked at me like that before. Only once... When I told her, her mother had died. You knew the first lady?
A little.
You know what she said to me that night we brought her to the hospital?
`Tommy... I think you should do a lottery. Every one should have a chance to go'. That's what Dorothy said to me. That's what we should have done.
There would have been chaos, sir.
President Wilson looks Adrian in the eyes.
You know what I believe, Adrian. I believe nature should choose for itself, from itself.
Adrian takes this in.
Don't let her go. You'll regret it if you do. Prove to Laura what kind of a man you are. And I'll do the same... You go now. And watch your back for Anheuser.
Adrian stares at the President in disbelief.
But sir?
Go. That's an order Helmsley.
A tense moment before Adrian starts to walk away. Just as exits the chapel, Wilson calls after him.
Would you tell my daughter... there's nothing on earth that I cherish more than her.
We hold on President Wilson's face.

Most of Las Vegas is destroyed. A 200 foot wide canyon no divides sin city along its famous strip. The towering cas still teeter along the canyon's rim. All forms of emergency rescue operations are deployed aro the city. In the FOREGROUND, we see Las Vegas International Airport its runway cut dramatically short. Large pieces of tarmac continue to break off into the crevasse.
Gordon maneuvers his plane through the chaos. Airplanes a strewn about the runway. Passengers everywhere.
I told you we should have gone to my parents' in the Rockies.
Gordon's right. Look at this mess.
Jackson looks around frantically.
You don't understand, it's our only chance.
This isn't one of your crazy stories now. How the hell are we gonna make it to China?
Gordon, without Jackson, we'd never have made it out of California.
Silence. Noah is right and they know it. They taxi past a private jet whose front wheel is stuck in a hole in the tarmac. We hear a dog barking and the CAMERA finds Tamara, with Caesar in her arms.
Careful with the landing gear! (in Russian) Tamara, get the boys out of the way!
An airport tow truck attempts to pull Yuri's Gulfstream j out. Sasha, the pilot, helps. A safety announcement echoe through the whole area.
(over loudspeaker) Attention! The US National Guard has informed us, that an extremely hazardous ash cloud is headed towards the city of Las Vegas.
Tamara looks scared and secretly reaches for Sasha's hand They share an intimate look, no one else sees.
We strongly advise every one to move indoors immediately...

The tow truck driver panics and runs inside. We move in on Yuri. For the first time he looks helpless. In the background, Jackson and his family join the panick crowd heading towards the terminal building. Firemen and rescue workers usher them forward.
Let's move people! Inside the terminal!
Jackson and his family are swept along.
Adrian rushes up the stairs of Air Force One, approaching of the flight officers.
Where's Anheuser?
In the command center, sir.
Adrian moves on.
Adrian enters. Anheuser immediately senses something is amiss.
The President is not coming. I couldn't convince him to.
Everyone in the room looks up, speechless.
So, the captain doesn't want to leave his sinking ship?
Well, Mr. Helmsley, we just learned that the Vice President's chopper crashed 80 miles north of Atlanta.
Adrian is shocked.
What about the Speaker of the House?
In this chaos... I have no idea!
But she's Commander In Chief now. Sir, I just think -
Anheuser moves in dangerously close.
I don't care what you think, Helmsley.
Laura quietly enters the Command Center, as Anheuser and Adrian stare each other down.
Your ass only made it into the White House, because your old man knew the First Lady... and because of all that affirmative action bullshit.
Anheuser takes it even further.
There was a white kid, much more qualified than you. Just so you know.
Adrian's face is ashen.
Where is my father?
Everyone turns to Laura. Silence.
He wanted to stay with his people.
Suddenly, the engines of Air Force One turn over. Laura panics.
We have to go back!
Adrian tries to hold her close to him. Anheuser sees this intimate moment and gives a suspicious, questioning look. second later Laura pushes Adrian away.
Let me get out. Mr. Anheuser - tell the Captain.
There is a protocol for just this situation Ms. Wilson and I'm afraid we'll have to follow it to the letter.
Anheuser turns to an officer.
Tell the Captain, to take off immediately.
Laura looks at him incredulously.
Emergency lights illuminate the densely populated termina
People, stay away from the windows!
One of the rescue workers yells, pushing Jackson and his family back. Frustrated, Jackson turns to Kate and Gordon.
We can't get stuck here.
Suddenly a voice...
Dr. Silberman? What are you doing here?
They all turn and stare at Tamara, holding her little dog against her plump breasts. Kate gives Gordon a look.
She's a patient, honey.
Nice work.
But when Jackson discovers Yuri behind her, his tone sudd changes. He gets in Yuri's face.
You bastard. You knew it all along! (at the twins) You and those spoiled rotten sons of yours...
Sasha comes running in and cuts through this.
I found us a plane, an Antonov. They were just about to take off, but the tower didn't let them.
Can you still fly that thing?
Sure... But I need a copilot.
Lilly chimes in.
Gordon is a pilot.
Before Gordon can protest Jackson picks up Lilly.
Let's go!
They burst through the emergency exit, setting off an ala Emergency personnel yell after them.
Hey! Stop! You can't go out there! Come back!
But they keep on running. Sasha now leads the way.
They race around the corner and come to a halt. Before th a Russian freight plane of enormous size-- The ANTONOV 225, the biggest aircraft in the world.
Wow, that is a big plane.
It's Russian.
Sasha, who has run ahead turns back and sees: A MASSIVE GREY WALL OF ASH moving towards the airport.
Guys, follow me!
They all run after him up the stairs.
Sasha enters the cockpit and puts on the headset while readying the plane for takeoff.
(into the mic) You'll find folding seats on each side of the cargo hold...
... Sit down and buckle up!
They all scramble to get into their seats.
Wow! Look at those!
They discover the cargo they are carrying-- Sports cars, SUV's, concept cars and luxury models, some them are labeled `Las Vegas Auto Show 2012'.
We had VIP tickets for that.
The six engines of the Antonov come roaring to life.
The plane is starting to move. Gordon sits uncomfortably the copilot's seat.
You check the main bus for the hydraulics. I'll balance the tanks.
Uh... What?
Sasha reaches over and does it himself.
Work the radio and keep an eye on the fuel, okay?
Gordon nods and puts on the headset, trying to focus.
People start SCREAMING, when they discover the menacing W OF ASH racing towards them.
Move back, people... down on the floor!
The nose of the Antonov turns onto the runway. This humon plane suddenly looks small against the wall of ash.
Gordon is panicking.
We have to get going!
Sasha hits the throttle.
We're going, we're going.
A deafening THUNDER emanates from the engines.
Everybody grabs their seat as the vibration of the aircra builds.
The Antonov steadily gains speed as it rumbles down the cracked and uneven runway. The canyon that has swallowed half the city looms ahead. behind them the volcanic cloud bears down.
Sasha stares down the gap ahead, determined. Gordon's fac as white as a sheet.
We're not gonna make it!
Shut up! We will!

The violent cloud has finally reached the airport. The terminals are hit by flying debris. Seconds later, Yuri's Gulfstream is whipped through the a shattering the huge windows into a thousand pieces. People are thrown like rag dolls as the jet explodes in a massive fireball.
Kate and Jackson hold their kids tight. Tamara clings to little Caesar and Yuri to his twins.

The Antonov lumbers heavily towards the inevitable drop o on the horizon. The runway is way too short... And to make matters worse, the ground begins to move agai slowly arching the tarmac upwards, creating a crooked ram the end of it.
A drop of sweat trickles down Sasha's forehead as he pull back the wheel. Gordon holds on for dear life as the huge plane barely li off, veering sideways.
The Antonov is on a collision course with the crumbling casino towers along the other side of the rim.
GOVNO! (shit). Help me pull!
Gordon grabs the wheel on his side, helping Sasha pull up beast of a plane.

Very slowly the plane starts to rise and Sasha's face lig up. They barely make it over a casino called `Paris; Las Vegas'. But the plane clips its wheels on a high metal structure right behind it, ripping away part of the landing gear.
After some struggle, Sasha manages to steady the Antonov. Gordon's face is green as he looks back.
Was that the Eiffel Tower?
Sasha looks over and grins. He grabs the microphone.
Ladies and gentlemen, we are on our way to China.

An ancient monastery built atop a solitary mountain rock. the distance, the sun glistens off the peaks of the Himalayas. NENG PANG, a young monk, 20, sits with his superior and teacher LAMA YAK LA, 65. They have tea beneath a huge bro bell.
(in Chinese) Do not believe in anything simply because you have heard it, Neng.
But Lin is my brother. He is working inside the big tunnels, where the ships are made.
The Lama remains silent.
What is in your wisdom for us to do, great Lama... if Lin is right, if our world is indeed coming to an end?
Instead of answering, the Lama serves him more tea. When the cup is full, the Lama doesn't stop pouring. Neng watches the tea overflow until he can no longer restrain himself.
It's full, great Lama. It can hold no more!
The Lama stops pouring and looks at Neng.
Like this cup, Neng, you are full of your own opinions and speculations. How can I show you wisdom unless you first empty your cup?
Neng bows his head in embarrassment. The Lama smiles to himself and takes a chain from around neck. On it hangs a set of rusty car keys.
Be careful with the clutch. It tends to slide.

The Lama throws him the keys and the young monk catches t smiling from ear to ear. They bow to each other and Neng off. Lama Yak La looks after him as a father would. He gets up strikes the bronze bell with a wooden mallet.

As far as you can see is a series of identical little hou The house in the foreground has a chicken coop in the gar Mrs. Pang enters the coop. We last saw her when the villa was being evacuated. She grabs one of the hens. She place its head on a woodblock and picks up a rusty hatchet. Just about to strike, she hears a strange RATTLING noise. An old truck comes driving towards the house. Behind the wheel sits her son Neng. She puts down the hatchet, yelli
(in Chinese) Bata! Neng is coming!
The young monk jumps out, quickly bowing.
Mother, I got a message from Lin. He wants us to meet him in Cho Ming, at the west gate. He says he can get us on one of the ships he is working on.
Mrs. Pang is still holding the chicken by its throat.
I thought Lin is working on the dam?
The dam is a ship, Mother. The government lied to us. There will be a big flood.
The chicken hangs limp in Mrs. Pang's hand.
Not here in the mountains... Let's eat first.
The hen panics as she puts its head back on the block, raising the hatchet again.
No mother! We must pack up right away.
We took a trip with the Laem Song ferry once. Your father was throwing up the whole way.
The door opens and Mr. Pang appears.
Neng, I did not know you were coming for dinner.
At that moment the hatchet drops with a THUD!
The majestic Antonov is flying high in the Pacific skies.
Look, the new Bentley.
The boys are exploring the huge freight deck. Caesar, the little dog, is traipsing along. Alec, Oleg and Noah marvel at a stylish mixture of luxury performance cars.
Our dad had one on order. We were supposed to get it next year.
But then he cancelled it again, because of the ships.
Noah points to a 2012 Aston Martin parked further back.
If I was rich, I'd get one of those.
We have one. How many cars does your family have?
My Mom's boyfriend has a Porsche, a Carrera 4.
Our parents are divorced too.
The boys share a moment of understanding.
Nothing we can do about that.
Noah reaches for the door of the Bentley. To his surprise opens.
Wow... look at this.
Noah jumps into the car.
Be careful, Noh'!
Kate and Lilly are still belted in next to Tamara. Jackso and Yuri sit on the other side of the Antonov.
How did you meet Dr. Silberman? He's great, isn't he?
I think for the same reasons you did. You know, after breast feeding two kids...
Kate looks at Tamara.
Did your husband ask you to get your's done?
We are not married. And we probably never will... But he paid for them.
I bet he did.
They laugh.
What did the man pay for mommy?
Nothing, Lil'bee.
Kate looks over at Jackson who's trying to make sense of Charlie's map. Tamara catches her looking.
What's your situation?
Kate lets out a sigh.
Way too complicated...
On the other side of the plane, Yuri has been watching th two women talk.
They seem to like each other.
I guess... So tell me Mr. Karpov - how much did you pay?
One billion euro, per seat.
That's disgusting.
You know Curtis, I wasn't always businessman. I am a boxer. Was my only playing when I was a boy, back in Murmansk. My coach...
... his name also Yuri... He always said: `Someone wants to beat you... he has to kill you first'.
Yuri puts his hand on Jackson's shoulder.
What would you have done, if you rich like me? Just look at your gorgeous kids. And call me Yuri...
Yuri offers his hand but Jackson doesn't shake it. Sasha's voice comes over the radio.
Hi guys. The plan is to refuel in Hawaii. So, buckle up... Gordon and I will do the rest.
Gordon turns to Sasha.
Let's get this straight, Sasha. I'm not a pilot. I'm a plastic surgeon. I just took some lessons to overcome my fear of flying.
Why did you give up?
It didn't work.
Gordon points to the declining altimeter.
What about the wheels we lost at take- off?
There's 14 on each side. Some of them must still be there.
With that, Sasha commences the landing procedure.
The Antonov dives into a thick layer of clouds.
Still nothing from the tower?
Gordon shakes his head. The two pilots stare ahead watching as the clouds slowly change color, from yellow... to orange. They stare out the window in disbelief.
Gordon comes climbing down the metal ladder whispering to Jackson and Yuri.
Guys, you really oughta take a look at this.
Jackson and Yuri follow Gordon back into the cockpit. The women exchange a worried glance.
When Jackson and Yuri enter, they don't believe their eye
What is that?
The State of Hawaii!
Not good. That is not good.
From above we watch as the Antonov flies over an endless ocean of fiery red lava. The Islands of Hawaii have turne into one big volcano.
How much fuel do we have?
Not enough. We'll have to make a water landing somewhere in the South China Sea.
At least we won't need our landing gear.
Yuri wonders.
What about it?
We lost it all... in Vegas.
The damaged landing gear slowly retracts into the vast be of the Antonov as it veers off to the east.
Adrian knocks quietly and sticks his head around the door Laura is sitting in her father's chair.
Can I come in?
I've got nothing to say to you.
But I do...
Adrian enters. He has his travel bag in one hand. He look Laura and gathers himself.
Your Dad and I... we were trying to protect you.
I'm a big girl Adrian. I don't need protection. You used me. You guys had me gallivanting around the world, as part of your little cover-up.
But you were doing a good job.
Sure, if your name's Da Vinci or Picasso. But if you're some young talent in Podunk, Texas, sorry you're not famous enough. People like you and Anheuser and my father - you think you can play God.
Adrian takes a moment, he's desperate to make her see.
You know what your father believed. That nature will choose itself from itself.
That's bullshit and you know it. It's the fittest, the richest and the strongest that survive.
That's not true.
Adrian glances down and spots Jackson's book poking out o his bag.
What would you say were the chances of a first time, middle-aged writer, who barely sold 500 copies of his novel making it on board this plane?
Zero. What's your point?
Adrian pulls out the book from his bag. He shows her.
It's called `Farewell Atlantis' and it's a fantastic read. It's part of our legacy now.
Laura takes this in. The plane's intercom cuts through th moment.
Mr. Helmsley, Prof. West requests your presence immediately.
Adrian takes a breath, but before he leaves -
What if I tried to sort some of this mess out? I need to know you can forgive me...
Laura looks at him sadly, but with a little hope.
I need to know that too, Adrian.
Adrian moves for the door. He stops.
One more thing. Your father told me you were the most precious thing to him in the whole world... You are to me too.
As Adrian exits, we hold on Laura's conflicted face.

The cloud from the Yellowstone eruption has hit Washingto D.C. hard. Pennsylvania Avenue resembles a war zone. A te inch layer of ash lies on the ground. The gates of the White House are wide open, with ash-cove rescue workers running about, resembling ghosts.

The President has turned the whole West Wing into a shelt He walks through the packed rooms assisting where he can. An old African-American LADY holds a crying young girl. President Wilson kneels down to her.
She can't find her mother.
Why don't you two girls make yourself comfy on that big couch? I'll see what I can do.
The child nods. The President gets up.
Sally, can you take care of them. I'll go check with the Red Cross...
As he leaves, the old lady looks up at Sally and smiles.
No wonder the First Lady fell for him. I knew Miss Dorothy Jones long before the President, when she was still singing jazz down in Atlanta with Harry Helmsley.
I know, she was amazing.
The President walks up to the Red Cross tents placed on t front lawn. He stops one of the Red Cross volunteers.
Who can help me with missing persons?
Without looking up, the young guy responds.
Sorry man, I'm busy right now.
He then recognizes who he's talking to.
I mean, of course sir. I didn't realize... What can I do for you, Mr. President?
The President pats him on the shoulder.
Don't worry about it. You're doing a great job son...

A deep, low rumble begins, stopping everybody in place. As it builds, the President grabs onto a tent pole to sec himself. He looks out over Washington D.C. His eyes grow wide... The National Mall bends like rubber. The towering Washing Monument breaks into pieces. An even more deafening sound makes him turn-- The Capitol Building rises from behind the trees, lifted by earth's incredible force. As the whole building breaks apart, the President is thro to the ground.
All the officers and scientists are glued to monitors tha show satellite images from all over the globe. Adrian and Prof. West stare in disbelief.
The capitol was hit by a 9.4.
Laura enters the command center unnoticed.
We lost communication with the White House, sir.
She stands there frozen, emotionless. She looks over to Anheuser, who is shouting orders. Another officer hands h phone.
President Makarenko for you sir. He's just entered Chinese air space.
Anheuser takes the phone and after a beat answers.
That's affirmative, Mr. President. Until communication is restored, I am in command.
Adrian and Laura look to each other baffled.
... It seems all other Heads of State are en route, however there are unconfirmed reports that the Italian Prime Minister has also decided to stay behind and trust in prayer rather than action...

Pope Benedict XVI holds mass in St. Peter's Basilica. Millions of followers flood Vatican City. It's a sea of candles. Amidst the mass of believers we see the Italian Prime Minister Antonioni with his family clinging to him. They are praying. A low RUMBLE. People look around frightened. In the dista we hear SCREAMING.

A few cardinals huddle together in silent prayer under Michelangelo's famous fresco. Most prominent above them i `The Creation of Adam'. The cardinals look up in horror as the rumbling intensifi A crack forms on the ceiling, shooting straight through G touching the finger of Adam. Then the whole fresco breaks apart.
The people in St. Peter's square begin to panic-- The entire Vatican is lifted up in the air. We hold on th Prime Minister and his family, as the basilica collapses the fleeing masses.
The giant statue of `Christ the Redeemer' on Mount Corcov Behind it, we see Rio de Janeiro being obliterated by vio quakes.
The famous statue of Jesus Christ begins to topple over a crashes down the mountain.

Neng Pang, the young Tibetan monk drives his truck up a b mountain pass. His parents huddle in the back of the pick The steering wheel is vibrating badly in his hands as he slides the clutch and downshifts. As the vehicle slows on steep incline, the vibrations become much worse. Neng wor that the truck may be breaking down. He pulls up and switches off the engine but to his surpri the steering wheel continues to vibrate. Looking out the windshield, he sees the whole earth shaki violently.
(in Chinese) Hold on back there!
Rocks fall all around them.
Jackson sits inside one of the luxury cars and tries the radio. Kate opens the passenger door and gets in.
Couldn't sleep huh? Me neither.
Anything?
Nothing, just static. Not even an emergency signal.
I can't think about what's going on down there.
Jackson switches off the radio.
I wanted to thank you. For coming back for us.
I couldn't have left you...
Silence. They both look out through the front windshield Lilly and Noah curled up together.
Do you think people change?
By `people' are we talking about me?
Do you think you've changed since we separated?
Well I certainly eat a lot more cereal now...
You know, you always had tunnel vision. You could always just block things out and write. You blocked all of us out Jackson.
He thinks about this and can't help asking.
Do you love him? Gordon...
I love him enough.
Kate gets out of the car and shuts the door. He watches h go.
The computers buzz with the incoming data.
... Cho Ming reports the first tremors, however none higher than 5.0.
Anheuser looks relieved. Then the big news hits.
The crust has begun to shift, Prof. West.
By what degree?
1.2 percent, but still moving.
Any clue what to expect next, Professor?
Once the movement of our land masses comes to a halt, we expect the formation of tidal waves, sir... proportional to the magnitude of the corresponding quakes.
Adrian looks distressed as he turns to one of the officer
Do we have any news from the Japanese seaboard?
Laura notices Adrian's concern.
We've recorded two quakes averaging 8.3.
She grabs Adrian's hand. Anheuser sees this and his suspicions about them are confirmed. A cold little smile appears on his face.

Tony is watching TV with a group of passengers. Harry has just entered and stands near the back of the room. A TEENAGE BOY with bad acne searches for an available cha that is still broadcasting. He finds a news program with lousy reception.
... Tokyo seems to have taken the severity of the hit... Unconfirmed reports indicate that the entire island of Japan is below water...
The signal gets weaker. Harry watches Tony slowly stand up. As he turns to his friend, his knees begin to buckle. His face is pale.
I called... But I never got through.
I'm so sorry.
Tony only stares back at him. Behind them, the TV rolls to the side, as the whole room begins to tilt. Harry grabs on to the door frame, as the passengers along with Tony fall like dominoes.
Tony!!
As the ship rolls to the side, Harry finds himself hangin from the door frame now 20 feet off the ground. He's bare able to pull himself up and roll onto the middle deck.

On his back, Harry is shocked to see the star field and t moon shifting across the sky. An eerie sound fills the air. A gigantic swell has formed to his right. It's a mountain of water. Harry turns to see another gargantuan swell close in from other side of the `Freedom of the Seas'.

The old walled city of Shibam is in ruins. The 2,000-year towers lie on the desert ground. Hundreds of believers ha gathered to pray towards Mecca. As they raise their hands to heaven in unison, they slow their motion and the chanting dissipates. They stare into the distance not knowing if what they see reality or only a mirage. A monstrous tidal wave rises from the desert sands thunde towards them.
President Wilson's body lays between the rubble. As he sl regains consciousness, all he can hear is the flapping so of the collapsed Red Cross tents.

As President Wilson gets to his feet, he sees-- A tidal wave come sweeping over the remains of the Washin Mall and it carries with it the battleships of the 14th F of the US Navy that were anchored in Chesapeake Bay. The President looks ahead, calm and peaceful.
I'm coming home Dorothy...
The CAMERA follows the aircraft carrier `USS John F. Kenn as it slams broadside into the White House.
Hushed voices. Anheuser, Adrian and Prof. West stand amon a group of officers and analysts.
All global ground communication has ceased sir.
The only signal our satellites are picking up are coming from the vessels in Cho Ming.
At least some good news.
Anheuser turns to Adrian.
Would our science advisor care to give us his assessment?
We expect enormous tsunamis to reach landfall in every continent. The Cho Ming area will be impacted in approximately six hours.
He nods to one of the analysts, who types in a couple of commands.
... and it looks like the crust has shifted by nearly 23 degrees in a south- westerly direction. Here's the computer simulation.
Everybody stares as the graphic illustrates what happened planet Earth.
Our data also shows, that our earth's poles have reversed their magnetic fields...
... These are their new positions.
Anheuser looks at the monitor, then turns to Adrian.
So Helmsley, what you're telling us here is that... the north pole is now somewhere in Wisconsin?
Silence. Adrian clears his throat.
It's the south pole, sir.
An ALARM SIGNAL goes off--
A red light blinks on the plane's instrument panel.
What's that?
Engine failure. GOVNO! Two of six are down. We must get ready.
Yuri and Jackson are standing behind the pilots.
Let's go wake up the kids.
Yuri nods and they make their way back to the lower deck.
Jackson's family are all asleep in their seats, Lilly in mom's lap. She looks like a little angel. Jackson can't b to wake them. He caresses Lilly's face.
Why do you hate Gordon?
Jackson turns to see Noah is awake.
