What are you talking about? I don't hate Gordon.
But you don't like him either.
I don't know him that well.
But I know him. He's really nice. You should talk to him more often. You guys would get along really well.
This breaks Jackson's heart. He pulls Noah tightly to his chest.
I'll give it a try, Noah. I promise.
Kate opens her eyes.
Is it time?
Jackson nods.
Wake up Lil'bee. We're getting ready to land.
On the opposite side of the aircraft, Yuri and Tamara hel the twins get into their life vests. Noah is suspicious.
What's wrong?
Jackson looks at his kids. They both look scared.
Sasha told us, it could get a little bumpy... and wet.
The Antonov jerks to the side. Two more engines out. Alar signals flash.
The remaining two engines barely hold the plane in the ai it dives into the clouds.
Jackson and his family huddle together. He puts his arms around Lilly and Noah.
Your daddy has to tell you something.
In the background, Gordon climbs down from the cockpit. H about to speak when he hears Jackson's voice.
I know that with my writing and work I didn't have a lot of time for you both...
Jackson glances at Kate.
I wasn't there for you, the way I should have been.
Jackson looks Kate directly in the eyes.
... And I am so very sorry for that.
Gordon watches as Kate pulls the kids and Jackson tight. the first time, they seem a little like the family they o were.
Jackson, Yuri... I think you guys should come back up here.
First Jackson and then Yuri enter the cockpit. Sasha poin out of the window.
Don't ask me how that happened.
Behind them Yuri and Jackson stare at the snow covered mountains of the Himalayas.
There's no more ocean, and it looks like we're pretty close to where we wanted to go.
It's as if the whole earth shifted by 1500 miles...
No shit.
It's called 'Earth Crust Displacement' Gordon... Prof. Hapgood, 1958.
Jackson brims with joy.
Way to go Charlie!
We lost our last two engines.
The plane drops rapidly, nearly scraping the tip of a mountain. Sasha and Gordon are doing all they can to keep Antonov in the air. A vast glacier spreads out in front of them.
I'll shoot for that glacier. Drain the brake fluids. It's going to get rocky... There, the blue levers!
The plane plummets, loosing altitude fast.
Listen up guys! This may sound a little crazy, but here's what you got to do...
Jackson and Yuri come running. Yuri yells at his boys.
(in Russian) Get up! Follow me!
Yuri bear, what are we doing?
We're taking the Bentley!
Sasha is struggling with the gyrating wheel. The glitteri snow field comes flying towards them.
CHTO ZA... Gordon! We're still too fast!
Sasha pulls the Antonov back up.
Now! Open it!
Gordon yanks with all his might. A loud NOISE.
The cargo door drops open. The Antonov is extremely close the glacier's surface. Jackson tries to start the Bentley, but nothing happens. Everyone screams in panic.
SHUT UP EVERY ONE!
They all go quiet, except for a few muffled barks from Caesar. Yuri speaks towards the dashboard, slowly and clearly.
Engine... start...
The motor revs to life. Yuri looks at Jackson.
Voice control... Sold me on it.
Sasha barely holds on. He yells at Gordon.
Your turn Gordon! Go! Make sure that they make it out of here before I touch down!
What about you?!
I'll be fine! I have to land this thing!
Gordon hesitates.
What are you waiting for!
Sasha nods at him reassuringly. Gordon bolts out.
The cargo door scrapes against the glacier, hurling ice everywhere. The Bentley roars.
Push it Curtis!
We're waiting for Sasha and Gordon.
Noah turns and sees Gordon.
Tamara! Open the door!
Gordon jumps in. Tamara yells at him in desperation.
Where's Sasha?
He said he'll be fine and we should get out of here before he touches down.
Yuri notices Tamara's distress as she keeps looking back the cockpit. Jackson slams the pedal down trying to gain much speed as possible to soften their landing.
Daaadddy!

The Bentley shoots out the back of the plane. As it hits snow, the air bags deploy cushioning the passengers. The Antonov hits the ice and catapults the rest of the lu cars out of the back cargo hold. They barrel past the Ben like skittles, narrowly missing it as they fly off in opposite directions. The plane skids across the glacier, clipping its wing and causing the aircraft to break apart. Sasha has no control anymore and watches helplessly as he shoots towards the ledge in the Antonov, plunging into th deep. The plane crashes and explodes.
As the snow settles we see that the glacier is scattered luxury cars tomb-stoned in the snow. The Bentley is half buried. We hear Caesar barking.
Everybody okay back there?
We're all fine.

The door opens and Jackson climbs out, looking around. Ju above the wind, he hears the SOUND OF HELICOPTER BLADES. One by one the others appear behind Jackson and stare at surreal sight-- Several Chinese Mil-26 choppers airlift animals over the mountain pass. GIRAFFES, ZEBRAS, EVEN ELEPHANTS hang by huge straps from these flying machines. One of the smaller helicopters veers from the transport f and lands near the Bentley. Armed soldiers jump out. Their Commander speaks to them i sharp tone.
Welcome to the People's Republic of China.
Jackson nods to them.
Thank you... (to Lilly and Noah) Say thank you, kids.
The others acknowledge the soldiers as well. Hi... Hello.
What color are your passes?
Jackson stands dumbfounded. The Commander repeats.
What color are your boarding passes?
Still no answer. He yells an order. The soldiers point th guns at them.
I have green card.
Surprised, Jackson turns to Yuri who's holding up three g plastic cards.
For my boys and me.
Tamara can't believe what she's hearing.
It's a joke... a mistake...
Right Yuri?
Yuri shrugs. Tamara lunges at him.
(in Russian) You disgust me. You pig.
Yuri brushes her off, coldly. And then speaks so they can understand him.
You think I did not know about you and Sasha? May god rest that poor bastard's soul.
With that Yuri turns to the others.
I am sorry guys. Good luck. And Jackson remember, if someone wants to beat you... he has to kill you first. Come boys!
The twins grab Caesar and climb into the helicopter. The barks furiously, wanting to stay with Tamara. The next moment, the helicopter takes off.
What!... Did that just happen!?
They're stranded.
Air Force One is in the background as Laura, Anheuser, an other members of the crew are rushed towards a group of waiting helicopters.
Adrian is a little way back in the middle of the pack. A Chinese Officer with a list shouts over the noise.
Mr. Anheuser - you're in Chopper 1. Dr. Wilson the same.
Laura and Anheuser reach the chopper. An authoritative Na Officer greets them, and raises his voice.
I'm Captain Richard Michaels. I'm the skipper of the American boat sir. After you!
Anheuser nods and climbs in the chopper. Captain Michaels helps Laura in. Adrian arrives just as the Chopper door slides shut and it lifts off.
Laura catches Adrian's look of unease before they soar aw
My sincerest condolences Dr. Wilson, for your father...
Laura's look thanks him for this. He turns to Anheuser.
Your party is the last to arrive.
I've been told of damages?
We haven't completed the assessment but it looks like we lost Number 4 when the crust shifted.
Captain Michaels looks up and points into the distance.
There it is!
The CAMERA follows the choppers revealing-- Nine gigantic oval gates that measure at least 60 stories built into the face of a mountain.

In front of every gate there is a line of huge `Y' shaped metal support structures, which are the launching towers the ships. They are each at least 800 feet high. It's an unparalleled feat of engineering.

The lead chopper descends onto a platform in front of one the gates, dwarfed against this majestic setting. The door slides open and Anheuser jumps out. Laura follow She looks around in awe. Even the utility entrances that lead into the mountain ar immense. The Captain guides them into the hollow mountain In the BACKGROUND we see an angry Yuri scream and argue w military personnel, waving his tickets.
What do mean we can't board Number 4? I want to speak to your supervisor.
I am the supervisor! Now get in line with all the others while we make arrangements.
I want your name!
(pointing to his
Can you read? Now get the hell back with the other green cards, or I'll have you detained.
The twins stand nearby, holding Caesar. They look afraid.
Jackson and his group are small specks in a barren landsc They have made it down the glacier and are now walking ov scree field. It is hard going. Jackson carries Lilly.
Keep thinking warm thoughts sweetheart. You're doing great.
Kate holds Noah by the hand. Gordon and Tamara trail behi She's still very upset.
I should have listened to you, Dr. Silberman. I actually liked the way I looked before that monster talked me into it.
Did you know he asked for a discount... and he paid in installments?
Cheap bastard.
You're better off without him. What he said about you and Sasha, is it true?
Tamara nods silently.
Now that he's gone I think he was worth a hundred times a man like Yuri.
Suddenly they hear the PUTTERING of an engine.
You guys hear that?
In the distance, an old rusty truck comes bumping down th dirt road. Jackson puts down Lilly and chases after it.
Neng and his parents drive past, billowing a huge cloud o dust just as Jackson reaches the road.
(out of breath) Hey! Help! Wait for us!
But Neng doesn't hear him over the rattling truck. Jackso pissed, kicks at the rocks on the road.
Shit! Shit!

Just then, Neng's mother, sitting in the back of the truc turns and sees his tantrum. She bangs on the rear window the cabin. Neng looks in the mirror and hits the brakes. Jackson can believe his luck.
The others show up and they all run towards the truck.

Anheuser and Laura follow Captain Michaels and a Chinese Steward over one of the many boarding bridges erected ins the cavernous mountain that lead to one of the monstrous arks. Laura stops halfway, gazing in awe-- Deep down below, thousands of workers are swarming over t ship, readying it for launch. Laura looks up and sees the contrast, spotting the SHEIK met in the Dorchester Hotel as he boards comfortably with huge family. Laura points down at the workers.
Captain Michaels? What happens to all those people?
The Captain doesn't know what to say. Anheuser turns.
Dr. Wilson, there's a protocol for all that. You just stick to your art. We'll handle the rest.
Laura hates him in that moment.
Captain? Where is the Bridge?
Anheuser and Captain Michaels move away as Laura stands a watches the frantic workers who are now boarding the anim we saw being airlifted over the mountains.
Dr. Wilson? Your cabin is this way.
Laura has a look of guilt as she follows the steward.
Thousands are on the march up the mountains. Behind them valley stretches into the horizon. Plumes of smoke rise f destroyed cities in the distance.

Amongst the refugees, we discover Satnam, the young astrophysicist, holding his little son. The rest of Satna family trails behind. Distant WARNING SIRENS pierce the silent march, coming fr the cities below. People start to scream and run, but Satnam stands there frozen. He fumbles for his satellite phone, then hits a number on its speed dial.
Adrian is unpacking. He lays down his copy of `Farewell Atlantis' just as his cell phone rings.
Satnam?
Where are you?
On the Nampan Plateau...
Adrian's face goes pale.
What?!
There's a tidal wave coming from the East! It's huge!
Satnam, what happened?
We never got picked up, Adrian, the airlift never came!
Adrian closes his eyes.
Satnam swallows hard. He stares out into the valley.
I have to go!

A wall of undulating foam and debris comes rolling toward him. A tidal wave of gigantic height. Everybody panics and scratches for a higher elevation. Bu for Satnam it is clear, they do not stand a chance.
He picks up his little son, squeezing him tightly to his chest, humming an Indian lullaby for the scared child.

Adrian hears SCREAMING on the phone and the deafening sou of the approaching wave. He tenses up, desperate but unab to do anything. As the noise reaches its height, the line goes dead. Adri is left breathless.
Adrian storms onto the bridge. Many officers and analysts at work under Captain Michaels.
Do we have the latest satellite images of Napam, India?
One moment, sir.
Anheuser and Prof. West step over and join him.
Helmsley, what's going on here?
Looks like our model was wrong.
They all stare at the monitor showing several tidal waves coming in from the south.
Satnam was talking about a wave from the East.
A science officer selects a different quadrant on the satellite display. They all stare at the new tidal wave that's coming from the East of the Cho Ming valley.
Jesus!
Anheuser is shocked.
What does this mean?
The flooding will happen earlier. Bobby, can you plug in the new data please?
As the officer does this, Prof. West looks at Adrian with questioning eyes.
Satnam didn't get picked up.
Prof. West is horrified.
Ready sir.
Adrian turns back to the monitor and sees the new tidal w that is coming towards the Cho Ming valley.
This one is at least 1500    meters high!
Talk to me Helmsley. What does this mean for us?
Bobby, plug in the new data and adjust the count down?

Every one on the bridge stares at a display. It reads-- 02hrs - 09min - 07sec The science officer nervously hits a few keys and the dis changes to-- 00hrs - 28min - 10sec... and counting. We see the shock on Anheuser's face.
Get me the other Heads of State.

Neng's truck, loaded with Jackson and the others, creeps to the service entrance of the launch site. A lone figure awaits them. This is Neng's older brother L who we saw signing up for the 'Chinese Dam Project'. Lin notices the strangers in the pick-up truck.
(in Chinese) Who are they?
Neng answers hesitantly.
We found them by the side of the road, my brother.
You must send them back.
I am a follower of the great Lama Yak La. You know I cannot do that.
The others watch the interaction but do not understand. Jackson senses a problem. He grabs Lilly and Noah.
Come with daddy.
Gordon and Tamara stare perplexed as Jackson approaches L with his kids.
At least take our children with you. Please.
Lin answers in broken English.
Why should I do that?
For the same reason you sent for your parents.
Lin stares at him stone faced. In desperation, Kate turns Mrs. Pang.
I have no clue if you understand what I'm saying, but I ask you as a mother, please take my kids with you!
Silence. A beat. The old Chinese lady turns to Lin.
(in Chinese) We are all children of this earth.
My plan will not work for so many, mother.
She looks up at her son, determined.
We will take them all. Bata?
Mr. Pang nods and reluctantly, Lin motions to Jackson to follow. Kate bows to Mrs. Pang.
Thank you ma'am. Thank you so much.
Jackson and the others acknowledge what Kate has done.

We finally reveal the unbelievable magnitude of this ship yard, built into the hollow belly of the mountains. Nine gargantuan vessels are lined up next to each other. Their size is at least four times that of the `Freedom of Seas'. However, they look more like spaceships than anyth having been built aerodynamically to withstand the full f of nature. But only three of these monstrous ARKS are complete. Numb is being repaired, all the others are still under construction, surrounded by scaffolding. Suddenly SIRENS goes off! The boarding bridges to the finished vessels begin to retract. There's growing confusion among the thousands of workers and security personnel.
Opposite the boarding bridges, on a large platform, Yuri his boys sit in line with the other waiting passengers. They watch as massive stern gates begin to close. Yuri ju up and yells to the others.
They're leaving without us!
The soldier from earlier points his gun at him.
What did I tell you!
Caesar barks at the guy.
Look! Idiot! They are leaving you behind too!

The soldier turns to the ships and Yuri knocks him out. H grabs his boys and runs towards the closing gates. All th other passengers surge forward with him. In the distance, on the bow side of the ships, the huge mountain gates of the bay open, revealing a stunning view Cho Ming Valley.
Lin leads his group over a ridge. In front of their eyes- The gates to the mountain open!
(in Chinese) We have to hurry! (to Jackson) They launch! We run out of time!
They follow Lin rushing down the hill, towards one of the many Y-shaped launch structures towering in front of the gates. Neng and Kate help Mr. and Mrs. Pang down the rock terrain.
A screeching and thundering noise! THE THREE COMPLETED VESSELS BEGIN TO INCH FORWARD on meta girders connecting the Y-shaped launch towers.

Laura feels a jolt. She rushes out of her small cabin and into a swarm of people moving down a crammed endless corridor. She struggles to fight her way through. A digital voice blares over the speakers.
Countdown to departure. Launch in 17 minutes - 42 seconds.
Laura bumps into one of Adrian's Science Officers.
Where can I find Adrian Helmsley?
He's in the Technical Command Centre. Follow me.
The three gigantic vessels emerge from the mountain, into open. Support helicopters swarm around them like flies.
Lin and his group look like ants as they scale the metal ladders of one of the launch towers.
Verbal commands fly back and forth. Anheuser watches the preparations from a large window. He looks over to the command bridges of the other vessels they continue to be pulled into place.
We cut to the various Heads of State, all at their comman posts.

A hatch opens at the top of the launch tower. Lin is the first to climb out. Right before his eyes, the hull of the American Ship slow creeps towards him. He's but a speck against this man-mad behemoth. Lin hastily pulls the others up.
(in Chinese) Faster, Neng! Help father! Mother, give me your hand.

It's a race against time. The huge ship's hull closes in fast. Lin and his family crawl up the side arm while Jack hurries to pull up the rest of the group. Lilly freezes at the sight of the approaching ship.
Move Lil'bee!

Jackson rips her out of harm's way, just in time. In a frenzy, he pushes her up the support arm where the others already huddled on a small platform. As the towering wall of steel passes by them, inches from their faces, Mr. Pang loses his balance. Jackson and Lin see this, but Jackson is closer-- He grabs the old man by his arm, saving him from falling his death. For the first time, Lin acknowledges Jackson with a nod.
The three completed ships are half way out, grinding to t final launching position. A mob of passengers led by Yuri has fought their way to t ship. More and more people join them, including soldiers.

Lin, Jackson and the group are huddled on the platform. The sound of SCREAMING PEOPLE makes them turn. The stormi masses have arrived at the access platform. There is now huge drop off between them and the tails of the ships.
Oh my god, that's Yuri!
Next to Yuri are his twins, holding Caesar. She yells!
Caesar!

The little dog hears Tamara and jumps out of Oleg's arms, leaping onto one of the thick cables, that connects the platform with the launching towers. Alec and Oleg attempt to run after Caesar, but Yuri grabs them by their necks.
Let that stupid dog go!
He's panicked. The arriving masses are pushing them to th drop off at the edge of the platform.
The ship has reached its targeted position. A small hatch lines up directly in front of Lin and his group.
(in Chinese) Okay. Now!
One by one they all climb into the hatch. Jackson being t last in, notices that Tamara has stayed back.
Tamara! Come on! Get in!
She doesn't move, anxiously waiting for her beloved dog darting towards her.

The mob pushes at Yuri and his boys. Passengers on either side tumble off the platform. Yuri watches one of them fall, hitting his head against a tiny ledge 8 feet below. To his right, he sees a small la leading down.
(in Russian) Down there! Oleg, you go first!
As they hurry down the ladder, people keep tumbling into deep. Reaching the ledge, Oleg discovers Caesar running towards Tamara.
Daddy look, Tamara!
Yuri cannot believe his eyes.

location: TOP OF LAUNCHING TOWER/CHO MING SITE

text: The hatch behind Tamara begins to move. The hydraulic supports are being lifted, sealing up the vessel.
Caesar darling!
Jackson reaches out from the closing hatch.
Tamara! Get in!
Tamara climbs inside the hatch and turns.
Come to mommy!
Caesar leaps into her arms only seconds before the hatch seals. As a last gesture, Tamara sticks out her arm and g Yuri the finger.

Lin leads the group into a long and narrow chamber where hydraulics for the tail gate are located. He opens a tool cabinet, retrieving a giant electrical po drill, almost too big to be carried by one person. Lin climbs to a hatch near the ceiling and begins to unsc the huge bolts. He looks at Jackson.
I need your help.

Laura and the Science Officer enter the Technical Command Center. She finds Adrian staring at a wall of monitors showing the horrifying scenario on the platforms. People are falling to their deaths in large numbers in th desperation to board the ship.
What in god's name is happening Adrian?
Anheuser convinced them all to launch.
Outside, panicking workers, screaming for their life! Deserted passengers waving their green cards! Adrian makes a decision and rushes out.
Anheuser turns hearing Adrian storming onto the bridge.
Anheuser! We have to stop this madness.
With that, Adrian turns to the Communication Officer.
Bobby, make sure the other bridges can hear this.
The officer hesitates as Laura enters in the background.
What do you think you're doing?
I know exactly what I'm doing. (To Bobby) Turn it on!
Bobby flicks a switch. Adrian's voice echoes through all ships.
This is Adrian Helmsley, science advisor to President Wilson...
The German Chancellor turns to one of the technicians on bridge of the European Ship.
Can you please turn up the volume, Mr. Hoffmann?
Next to her stand the British and French Prime Ministers.
I know we've all been involved in making difficult decisions... to save our human civilization...
Anheuser looks on stoney faced.

... But to be human means to care for each other, and civilization means to work together to create a better life. If that's true there is nothing human and nothing civilized about what we're doing here. Ask yourselves ... Can we really stand by and let all those people out there die?
Laura watches him proudly.
A civilization that allows that, does not deserve to survive.
Or at least I don't want to be part of it.
Anheuser cuts in with sarcasm.
We'll miss you Helmsley but somehow we'll get by. Officer switch that off.
The Communications Officer looks at Adrian.
That's an order soldier.
Don't do it!
The Russian President, together with the heads of state f China and Japan, listen in as Adrian responds.
We have to open our gates and let these people in. All of them.
Anheuser has had enough.
Have you lost your mind? Look at the countdown. We have less than five minutes left... And none of our ships have the resources to feed those people. If you save them today we all starve tomorrow.
He's almost screaming now.
Do you wanna be responsible for the extinction of the human race? Can you handle that, Adrian?!
Silence. Adrian's battle seems lost. But he doesn't give up, and instead speaks softly now.

There is a young astrophysicist from India who is the reason we are all here, trying to give mankind a second chance. He's the one who discovered it all, the one who connected the dots. We all owe him our lives.
All eyes are glued to Adrian.
I just learned that he was killed with his family by a tsunami in eastern India. You know why?
Adrian stares Anheuser in the eyes as he continues.
He died because we forgot to pick him up.
I beg you... whatever our future holds don't let us start it with an act of cruelty. What will you tell your children... and their children?
Silence. Laura steps up alongside Adrian.
If my father were here, he would open the gates.
Adrian and Laura share a look.
The people of Russia along with...
His Asian colleagues nod in approval.
... China and Japan agree to open the gates.
The German Chancellor speaks up.
The United Kingdom, Spain, France and Germany, and I believe I can also speak for the Italian Prime Minister...
... We vote to open the gates.
Laura and Adrian watch Anheuser shaking his head in defea Bobby, the Communications Officer smiles with relief. Adr turns to the Captain.
Captain Michaels, you heard them.
One by one the gigantic gates at the stern of the three s begin to creek open. The masses gathered on the platform CHEER wildly!
Lilly crawls through the CONNECTING TUNNEL meeting up wit Kate in a large bay on the other side.
Phew... It stinks in here.
Together with Neng and his parents, they all look up in
A Giraffe, chewing her cud, smiles down at them. Caesar b at her.
Sssh...Caesar.
A second later, hundreds of different ANIMALS RESPOND. Th are in the zoological bay.
Gordon helps Noah up the small ladder leading to the connecting tunnel. Just as he goes to hand him Jackson's backpack, the HYDRA MOTORS begin to GROWL! Lin looks up in panic. He screams.
They're opening the gate! It will crush us!
The whole ceiling begins to lower towards them. From down below, Jackson sees his son about to be hit by it.
Noah! Watch out!
Gordon makes a split second decision. With all his streng he shoves the boy into the tunnel.
From the other side of the tunnel, Kate watches as the me ceiling misses Noah by a hair, but catches Gordon, wiping off the ladder.
No!

Jackson watches helplessly as Gordon falls past him. He survives his landing and desperately tries to grab on to sloping surface, but he can't. He slips. Gordon is crushed between the gears, sharing his last loo with Jackson before he dies.
Kate helps a trembling Noah out of the tunnel.
Something happened, mom.
Kate pulls him close and shuts her eyes tightly. She figh back the tears.
Jackson and Lin know they're running out of time, their remaining space is shrinking every second.
We have to stop it!
Lin grabs the huge electrical power drill nearby and atte to jam it between the hydraulic arm and the wall. As it digs deeper into the metal, the hydraulic starts to slow down.
Still on the ledge, Yuri and the boys watch as the huge boarding gate lowers towards them. They are trapped. Just then, the gates begin to slow, but surely they will crushed.

Back in the chamber, Lin still struggles with the drill. Suddenly he slips. Jackson manages to catch his fall. But in the process Lin foot gets caught between the gears, mangling it. He screams in pain as the hydraulic slowly grinds towards halt.
You did it, man. You did it.
In great pain, Lin grins back at him.
The gates of the ships hit the access platform with a thundering noise. People begin to rush on board.
Alarm signals go off. The Captain turns to one of his officers.
What's wrong with the gate?
I don't know. Maybe there's something jamming it, sir.
The countdown on the monitor reads 2 min. 40 sec. Laura a Adrian share a worried look. We hear a HOLLOW BELL ring!
Lama Yak La rings the large bronze bell of his monastery.

The booming sound echoes through the Cho Ming valley. As gentle wind catches the Lama's clothes, he looks up-- A tidal wave of immeasurable proportion crests the mounta The Lama continues to strike the bell as the monastery is wiped clean from the earth.
The technicians desperately try to figure out what's wron An officer waves Adrian over.
Sir, we have a breach in the zoological bay.
Can you zoom in?
The video camera moves in on Kate, Noah and Lilly. Adrian can't believe his eyes. He turns to Laura.
I know those kids. Remember the book I told you about? Their father wrote it.
Captain Michaels shouts across the room.
We're loaded. We can close the gates sir.
Do it!
Anheuser looks nervously at the countdown. It reads 1:34

Above Yuri and the boys, people are leaping from the acce platform onto the stern gate of the American ship. Yuri looks for a hole in the flow of people before seizin his chance and lifting the first of his boys up.
(in Russian) Pull yourself up!
Oleg manages to reach up and hold onto the gate.
Inside the ship, officers yell.
To the lower decks people!
The gates suddenly screech back into life and begin to cl Yuri doubles his efforts lifting Alec higher, but Alec ca quite reach. Yuri strains with all his effort before deciding.
Oleg! Catch your brother!

Yuri leaps forward holding Alec out in his arms. Oleg manages to grab his brother's hands as Yuri lets go falls into the deep crevasse below. He makes no noise unt he hits the rocks beneath. Oleg pulls his brother from above.
A SIREN blasts. Both of Yuri's sons are now on deck. A loading officer pulls them back, away from the gate.
Boys, you gotta move.
We wait for our father! He's still down there!
The loading officer attempts to comfort them.
There's no one down there.
Come on boys, come...
The Officer and the boys look back as the stern gate slow closes. But with a SCREECHING sound it grinds to a halt. The gate is jammed open leaving a twenty foot gap.
ALARMS sound. Anheuser and the Captain stare at the monit
Why is the stern gate not closing?
Something's wrong with the hydraulics, sir.
Captain, over here.
They race over. Adrian points to a monitor.
I think we found the problem.
On the monitor, they see Sarah and the others desperately waiting for Jackson and Lin.
How did they get in there?
They must have come through the hydraulic chamber. There...
Bobby, the Surveillance Officer, selects a different came and we now see inside the tunnel in which Jackson is pull along a wounded Lin.
That guy is injured. Something must have gone wrong.
You're damn right something went wrong! Congratulations Helmsley, you may have just killed us all but as long as your conscience is clean...
Adrian tries to ignore this.
Let's get an emergency crew there right now. I'll meet them at the Hydraulic Chamber.
Anheuser sneers him, shooting a look to Laura.
You think you're the main man now, just because your fucking the President's daughter?
Without thinking, Adrian turns and punches Anheuser hard the face. He drops to the floor, out cold. Everyone stands in stunned silence. Laura smiles. Adrian looks around.
What are you all waiting for?
They speed off. The countdown reads 0 min. 53 sec.
Further down in the valley, the tidal wave has reached th Cho Ming airfield, blasting away the planes with overwhel force.
The massive propellers of the ships begin to turn. Howeve the props of the American ship don't move. In the background, the huge tidal wave comes thundering towards them.
An IMPACT WARNING sounds as Adrian and Laura race through crammed hallways with members of the rescue crew. One of officers explains.
If we can't close the stern gate, then the engines won't start.
There's no way to override it?
No sir, it has to be done manually.
Kate, Noah and Lilly watch as Jackson nears the end of th tunnel with Lin. Neng comforts his brother who's about to pass out.
(in Chinese) Almost there, Lin...
All three vessels are now engulfed in churning water. They rock back and forth. Only the huge support towers they're resting on, keep them anchored.
A new ALARM sounds as water begins to shoot through the o stern gate of the American ship. The people on the loading bay panic, among them we see Al and Oleg.
The same ALARM rings out in the hallways of the ship. Lau Adrian and their party are all braced against the corrido as the vessel undulates back and forth.
Water has penetrated the stern!
Laura looks unsure.
What now?
The rear of the ship will start sealing itself up one compartment at a time.
Adrian looks at him.
Then how will we get to the hydraulic chamber?
If we don't hurry, we won't be able to.
Despite the violent movement of the ship, Adrian pushes o down the corridor towards the back of the boat. They foll
Water is also now rushing into the Zoological Bay and onl the giraffe can manage to keep her head dry. Jackson is not yet out of the tunnel with an unconscious
Kate shouts across to Tamara.
Tamara! Take Lilly and Noah.
Kate reaches in to help Jackson as Tamara begins to move Lilly. Noah remains back with his mother. Jackson finally makes it through with Lin. Kate is almost tearful with relief to see him.
I was so worried about you.

Suddenly the Zoological bay begins to seal itself off. Lilly, already in the next compartment with Tamara and he dog, screams out as a chamber door quickly slides up, fro the floor to the ceiling. It separates Lilly from her fam
Mummy!
Jackson and Kate turn but it's too late. They only catch glimpse of Lilly before they are sealed in. The water lev continues to rise.
Panicked, Tamara turns and looks around. Down the corrido in the distance, she sees Adrian, Laura and the rescue cr approaching. But between them she spots the next chamber door rising quickly.
Lilly run!

Lilly starts moving as Tamara turns and picks up Caesar. Moving quickly, Lilly is able to climb up and over the fa rising door. But as she dangles from the other side, she looks down and is too scared to jump.
Lilly! Take him.
Lilly looks up and sees two hands straining to hold Caesa above the quickly narrowing gap. In a courageous move, Lilly grabs the little dog before h gets crushed and together they fall to the ground.
Back on the other side of the chamber door, Tamara looks around. She is trapped now as the water continues to rush
Laura picks Lilly up and comforts her. Adrian realizes th are too late. He turns to the rescue crew.
Is there any way to talk to them?
Lilly is close to tears.
The water continues to flood in as Jackson helps Neng wit his unconscious brother.
We have to move him higher. (looks around) Over there!
Suddenly, a VIOLENT SHAKE throws them all off balance, pitching them into the water.

In the debris-filled, murky waters we see that the fusela of Air Force One has slammed against the first of the shi launch towers. Slowly it begins to bend, finally giving way. The other launch towers follow like dominos. The ship is ripped from its anchorage and sent drifting sideways, rudderless.
Chaos. Fear. Everybody holds on for dear life.
The vessel is swept away, over the mountain ridge.
Alec and Oleg scream, desperately trying to hold on as th whole ship capsizes.

The giant ship drifts upside down and rudderless - smashe around by the debris and raging waters. But then, as it hits another ridge, it rolls right side u and seems to steady itself. However, the strong currents continue to force it through mountain ranges of the Himalayas.
The officers try to regain some control.
Moving at 34 knots, sir.
What is our position?
Darjeeling valley, heading south east, sir.
The Captain's face drops.
You must be kidding!
The water rises fast as Kate sees the severity of Lin's w for the first time.
We need something to stop the bleeding or he'll die.
A split second later Noah holds out his belt.
Mum, will this do?
Suddenly Jackson hears a voice over a speaker.
(Over a speaker) Mr. Curtis... I'm Adrian Helmsley. We met once before. Your daughter is with me.
Kate screams with relief.
Lilly!
Adrian is using an emergency wall intercom, with Laura ne to him, holding Lilly.
I'm alright Mom!
Caesar barks.
Tamara hears Caesar over the speaker in her compartment a smiles with relief. She is struggling to stay afloat thou and is running out of air.
Jackson discovers the wall speaker. He moves closer to it
We can't get to you. Whatever you did, jammed the hydraulics. If you can't get it out... None of us will make it.
All eyes are on Adrian as he speaks.
You're our only hope.
Adrian looks at Laura.
I'll go back. I'll try my best.
I'll go with you.
You stay with Mommy.
Jackson looks at Kate.
I'll be right back...
The water is up to their chest now. Jackson takes a breat and disappears underwater.
Back on the bridge, Anheuser regains consciousness and ge to his feet. His nose is bleeding. He looks around him.
Captain, what's happening?
The Captain looks at him annoyed.
What's happening?...
We're heading straight for the north face of Mount Everest, Mr. Anheuser.
Anheuser looks at him dumbfounded as he stumbles to the window and sees the massive rock face of Mount Everest in distance.
Jackson swims down into the dark chamber and reaches the jammed power tool, pulling at it. But it doesn't budge.
The water level in Tamara's compartment is at its height and she goes under. She struggles below the surface for a moment, looking aro desperately for a way out but there is none. Tamara drowns.
Jackson manages to find an air pocket. He fills up his lu with air and thinks hard. As he strips off his jacket, he seems to have a plan. He dives under again.

Lin is being held up in the water by his brother and pare Kate has wrapped the belt around his lower leg and now pu it tight. Lin screams. Noah uses this as the moment to dive underwater, unnotice to go and help his father.

Back under water, Jackson is using the extension cord of power drill to pull himself down to the tool cabinet. Jackson opens it, retrieving a giant crowbar. He begins t use it to dislodge the tool but it's hard work.
Anheuser and everybody on the bridge stares as the north of Mount Everest is almost upon them.

Kate and the Pangs are desperately close to running out o air now, but despite this, Kate still tends to Lin. After a moment she turns and is first confused then horri to see that Noah is nowhere to be found.
Noah!

Jackson pulls with all his might, but he can't quite shif the drill. To his surprise, a pair of young hands join his on the ha of the crowbar. Noah is alongside him now, helping. Working as father and son, they manage, little by little, loosen it before finally the drill comes free. Adrian gives Noah the thumbs up and the boy heads back to surface. Jackson goes to follow but in the last moment he spots the knapsack containing his laptop. He dives back down for it.
Noah emerges from the water.
Mom, we did it!
Kate pulls him to her, relieved he is safe. Noah smiles a calls out towards the nearly submerged speaker.
Lilly and Laura wait nervously. They hear a muffled voice
We got it free. Can you hear me? We did it!
Adrian leaps up when he hears this. He flicks a button on intercom.
Captain Michaels - close the gate!
Hearing this, the Captain yells the eagerly awaited order
That's affirmative. Close the gate!
Ay, ay, Sir.
We hear a BOOMING sound as the tail gate finally seals.

Jackson reaches his knapsack, but when sees Noah's cell p lying next to it, he makes a decision and reaches for tha instead. He hears the muffled sound of the engines and smiles. But he turns to swim back, his face freezes-- He's looking into the lifeless eyes of Gordon, who floats inches from his face.
The gigantic propellers fight against the current, hittin rock at the base of the mountain.
The battle seems hopeless. Captain Michaels yells at the of his lungs.
Engage starboard stabilizers!
One is engaged... two is engaged... number three is out, sir!
The vessel scrapes against the rocks, throwing Anheuser t the floor.
The giant ship escapes the mountain with an inch to spare
Everyone on the bridge watches in awe as Mount Everest, earth's highest peak, drifts slowly past. After a long beat, they begin to holler and cheer.
Kate hears the CHEERING coming from the speakers. The wat level stops rising but she still looks around in panic.
Noah! Where is he?
Noah begins to cry.
He was just behind me...
Finally! Jackson bursts out of the water and takes a lung of wonderful air. Kate and Noah are overjoyed. The Pangs smile to one anoth Jackson looks Kate squarely in the eyes.
If you would ever consider to give me another chance... I promise, I'll always be there when you need me.
Kate embraces him tightly.
Whatever you do... I will never let you go again.
Noah is all smiles.
We hear a voice.
... Day 988. No one is waiting for anything to happen...
The CAMERA moves over the last lines of Jackson's novel.
Adrian sits in his cabin, his copy of `Farewell Atlantis' his lap.
...   and all we can hear is the sound of our   own breathing that reminds us we are   still sharing our memories, hopes and   ideas.
Opposite him, Laura sits listening to him read.
... And funny, just today we found out that the entire crew of the Atlantis, somehow or another, has relatives in Wisconsin.
The end.
Adrian closes the book. There's a moment of silence.
How many copies did you say that sold?
Less than 500. (with a smile) It's what you might call a cult classic.
Laura looks at him grinning.
It seems we have very different tastes Mr. Helmsley?
Well that's healthy Dr. Wilson. Something we could maybe explore... unless you have other pressing engagements.
Actually my diary's pretty open.
The intimate moment is cut short.
(over loudspeaker) Mr. Helmsley to the bridge please.
Adrian and Laura make their way to the bridge.
Ladies and gentlemen, this is Captain Michaels speaking. In a few minutes, I will be giving the orders to unseal the decks.
Jackson and his family stand amongst thousands of other people who are gathering in anticipation.
Please be careful when you step out and of course... enjoy the fresh air.
Jackson kneels down and zips up Lilly's jacket. She is holding Caesar, whose still wearing his diamond collar.
Daddy? When can we go back home?
There's nothing we can go back to Lil'bee. Whatever's out there, that's our home now. Don't be scared.
I'm not Daddy. No more pull-ups.
That's my big girl.
Jackson squeezes Lilly's shoulder.
Can we pet him?
Lilly turns to see Yuri's boys standing next to her.
Of course you can. He's your doggie.
The boys both smile at her.
Adrian and Laura enter the bridge.
You called for me, sir?
Prof. West has something to show you, Mr. Helmsley.
The Captain directs him to a monitor.
Looks like your scientific projections are way off again.
The Captain grins at Prof. West.
The water is receding much faster than we projected, Adrian...
A monitor reveals an image of the African continent, howe its shape changed dramatically. The image of the southern is enlarged.
What's that?

It's hard to believe, but the Himalayas are no longer the roof of the world. It's now the Drakensberg mountains of Kwa-Zulu Natal. The whole African continent has risen several thousand feet and most likely, never even flooded.
Our European colleagues have already set course for it.
Captain Michaels hands Adrian a short wave radio.
Here, somebody wants to talk to you.
Adrian curious, grabs the mic.
This is Helmsley.
We hear a muffled, raspy voice through the speakers.
Harry Helmsley stands beside the cruise ship's Captain.
No, this is Helmsley.
Dad!... Is that you?
Adrian is ecstatic. Captain Michaels explains.
We should have a visual of the `Freedom of the Seas' shortly.
Dad. We're coming to pick you guys up. How's Tony?
Harry looks over at Tony who's listening, smiling.
He's fine, son. We're all fine.
See you guys soon. Bye dad.
Harry hangs up. He picks up Tony, embracing him wildly.

Suddenly a horn sounds and the sealed deck doors let off burst of pressurised air. A murmur goes through the crowd Everyone is silent as the huge deck doors slowly begin to roll back and light streams in.
The Pang family try to see over people's heads, even Anhe looks hopeful. Jackson pulls his family close as the firs rays of daylight hit their faces.
Hatches unseal all around the ship. Sun streams through t clouds. Everywhere people emerge outside, into the light day. A majestic moment.

They all stare in awe at the waters receding against the covered mountain peaks. Caesar lets out a YELP of joy. Almost as soon as the doors have opened, the ship's HELICOPTERS take off, flying towards a stunning site-- The `Freedom of the Seas' is perched on a mountain peak, surrounded by calm waters. Behind it, they see the most beautiful rainbow. This is the new world. And again we hear Mozart's Adagio...
